access: You'll have all studio for yourself! Gym access, washer & dryer available at the building. Everything that you need for a comfortable stay.
description:
Best location you can find! Just steps from the Chicago River Walk, Magnificent Mile, Michelin restaurants, bars, shops, grocery stores; right in the middle of the River North - also close to downtown. Good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers and small families. Fully equipped, you will find everything you need to have a perfect stay, and to explore the city, you will find transportation at your doorstep. The building offers pool and gym for the guests.

The apartment is a great place to relax and unwind after a day of conferences, shopping, exploring Chicago, or whatever it may be. 
Enjoy the privacy of your own flat during your stay. Full of helpful amenities and little luxuries, it's the perfect place to call home for a weekend, or extended stay. Prepare a home-cooked meal in its fully equipped kitchen with everything you need. Enjoy the baths with soaps, shampoos, and more bathrooms amenities like hairdryers and extra large towels.

Enjoy a great night's sleep in the queen sized, with linens, pillows and extra blankets. Sit and watch in front of the Smart TV your favorite movie on Netflix with our complimentary Wi-Fi with high speed.

You'll have all studio for yourself! Gym access, washer & dryer available at the building. Everything that you need for a comfortable stay.

We are always available and will try to answer your questions as quickly as we can.

Flexible time for check-in. Send us a message and we will arrange it for you.

access: Guests will have access to the entire apartment, however doors that are locked are private.
description:
Want city living without the traffic and crowds? We are perfectly situated for you to have all the convenience of quick public or highway transit to Chicago while staying in a safer family friendly environment.  Oak Park has tons of history, cool shops,  award winning dining, amazing Frank Lloyd architecture, and even backyard chickens with fresh eggs to enjoy!

There is a backyard deck  for your outdoor enjoyment and a chicken coop to watch for your outdoor amusement. The downstairs unit has the 2 friendliest and most adorable Basset hounds that will often nap in the yard as well.
Well appointed kitchen, Keurig, toaster oven, dishwasher, everything you need to make a gourmet meal or keep your trip on a budget.

Guests will have access to the entire apartment, however doors that are locked are private.

We are quickly available if anything is needed during your stay and let us know if you want ideas on cool places to visit or yummy restaurants to enjoy, tell us your tastes and we will help you find where to explore.

We are steps to the Oak Park Arts District with cool galleries, shops and restaurants and directly next door to Barrie Park with playground, large sled hill and open fields for outdoor fun!

We are located walking distance from the Blue line L stop so you can travel without a car and only a few blocks from the Eisenhower Expressway for a quick trip to downtown Chicago.

The keypad deadbolt locks will be coded for the last 4 digits of the primary guest's phone number.

access: Guests have access to the kitchen and all of the ammenities.
description:
A new 3 bedroom condo with two rooms available. Both have a comfortable full size bed, desk, mirror and no clutter of any kind. Parking is free and easily available. I work nights so i am away for most evenings.

This condo is on the second floor and has a great view of the neighborhood. It is very close to the train to downtown. There is a large park with a lake across the way and a long above ground bike trail nearby.

Guests have access to the kitchen and all of the ammenities.

I am always available by phone and you may see me in and out or i may help check you in. I work nights.

Wicker park is close with lots of shopping and late night bars. Down the street is a Cuban restaurant and a great sports bar.

The train to downtown is just down the street.

My dog Beau is very friendly. He does not bark and is very chill. He is a Shihtzu breed and is therefore hypo- allergenic and does not shed. This is 3 bedroom with two to rent, therefore, there may be another guest or guests in the room adjacent. Although check out is at 10:00 a.m. this is just for the room to be changed. Anyone can continue to be in the condo or is welcome to leave their luggage in the living room if their flight departs later in the day.

access: You will have the entire first floor apartment.
description:
Awesome 2 bedroom/1 bathroom in one of Chicago's top neighborhoods. Trendy boutiques, outdoor cafes, and great restaurants and bars. Very family friendly neighborhood with plenty to do with family and friends!

This is our 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom fully furnished apartment in the heart of Roscoe Village. Whether you‚Äôre planning a weekend excursion, business trip or need a comfortable place to stay for family or friends, consider our Guesthouse.

You will have the entire first floor apartment.

We are a full service vacation rental agency, with a virtual front desk and concierge.

Trendy Roscoe Village offers boutique shopping and a variety of restaurants & bars.

The apartment is approximately 4.5 blocks from Paulina ‚Äú El‚Äù stop which will take you downtown. It's also about 4 blocks away from a Wrigley shuttle stop!

We do have a 4 bedroom 2 bath unit in the same building that could sleep an additional 10 guests. The property can accommodate up to 16 total guests.

additional_house_rules:
1) The entire property is smoke and vapor free. We have marijuana and tobacco chemical sensors on the property. They know it's not cooking smoke, They react to airborne particulate, not the smell on your clothes. The PolySens¬Æ technology works, so exit the building if you want to smoke/vape or you'll be fined $500 and asked to leave.

2) Your reservation has paid for a specific number of guests on it. Anyone over this number, whether visiting or sleeping, you must have written permission from us. We have a hallway camera to verify. We're going to be totally fine with 95% of requests, but we do require you to clear it with us first.

3) Quiet hours are 10PM-8AM. Noise should not be heard coming from your apartment. This is a quiet residential building. 95% of our guests have no issues, and never hear from us. We will be sure to send you at least 2 warnings prior to asking anyone to leave, but one way or another, the apartment must be quiet.

4) Parties, events, and commercial activity are not allowed.

5) We reserve the right to ask you to leave without a refund if any of the above rules are broken.

6) Lost keys will incur a $100 charge. We have to change the locks. Please use the app to send a picture of all the keys at check-in AND check-out.

7) We do not accept instant bookings from residents of the Chicago metropolitan area as identified by profile city or phone number area code. If you live near Chicago and would like to book a stay, please send us a message with a little more information about your plans.

8) Our favorite restaurant in Chicago is La Scarola.


Privacy Statement on the Use of Security Cameras:
We respect and value the privacy of our guests. We will never place a camera inside a living space. While Airbnb policy allows cameras in spaces that are not used for sleeping or bathing, we disagree. Cameras should be banned from inside all living spaces. Footage should be automatically deleted. Everything should be disclosed in advance. We use hallway security cameras to verify the number of guests who have entered an apartment. This is useful for stopping parties, and under additional prices extra guest charges may apply for extra people sleeping over.  All footage is deleted automatically after a stay, unless there is an open resolution center case. It‚Äôs unfortunate that not every guest is honest about their intentions, and our community would not allow us to be on Airbnb if we did not prevent unwanted behaviors. Let us know if you have questions. We have nothing to hide.

access:
The entire apartment is yours during your stay! Book for one person or five, it doesn't matter - you WILL NOT share this apartment with anyone outside of your own group! 

The sundeck, gym, and lobby are shared spaces, and you should be respectful of that. 

Guests may drop off their bags as early as 12PM (noon), and the cleaners may still be in the apartment until 4PM.

Unit may be accessed by maintenance for repairs during stays.
description:
Quiet, modern, industrial styled luxury loft with the best location in Wrigleyville! 1 block from the red line in the most sought-after neighborhood for young people to live. Wrigleyville is known for its overabundance of restaurants, bars, boutiques, and coffee shops abounding on every corner.  Street festivals, theatres, concert halls, and comedy clubs are never far. This is the mythical neighborhood experience everyone on Airbnb talks about.

Flooded with natural light and concrete ceilings that soar, the feeling is airy, spacious, industrial luxury. This is a brand-new, high rise building from the ground up!

Want advice? Looking for that local knowledge? We've got a guidebook telling you all the secrets! We're from Chicago. We live here. We know the place, and we have an opinion!

GET READY! Freshen up in your brightly lit bathroom, featuring:
- glass walled shower
- amazing high-pressure shower-head
- towels, body wash, shampoo, and conditioner provided for all guests

GET COFFEE! Kick the morning into overdrive with a caffeine jolt!
Choose from a wealth of coffee options and equipment: 
- French press and drip machine
- ground AND whole bean coffee
- sweeteners and half/half are all provided
- Starbucks is also across the street!

GET WORKING with smoking fast WiFi! 
- two dedicated signals per apartment! 
- 100MBPS Service with a 1750MPBS Router. 
- no more wimpy hotel WiFi!

GET COOKING in your full kitchen! 
All the amenities you'd expect from a luxury building:
- stainless steel appliances
- solid quartz countertops
- dishwasher
- salt, pepper, and oil stocked
- pots and pans, tableware, glassware and silverware provided!

GET OUT and enjoy Wrigleyville, Boystown, and Lakeview! 
Sports bars, nightclubs, casual dining, live music, karaoke bars, dives, LGBTQ spots... all right here!

GET A GOOD NIGHT'S REST to do it all again tomorrow
- Bedroom offers the coolest adult bunk beds you‚Äôve ever seen! 
Two king beds support 2,000 pounds! Plenty of don't-bang-your-head-clearance and an oversized ladder. They cost five grand, and are worth every penny! Everything about them was built for comfort. Read the reviews. Look at the pictures. People love our bunks!
- Twin memory foam rollaway bed ready for your use!
- Linens provided for every guest!

GET A LOCAL TAKE
Looking for that local knowledge? Want a no-BS take on the area?
We've got a guidebook telling you all the secrets! We're from Chicago. We live here. We know the place, and we have an opinion! Let us help!

And last but not least, enjoy the building's INCREDIBLE AMENITIES! 
Massive SUNDECK with fire pit and tons of seating on floor 3!
24-HOUR GYM with plenty of cardio equipment on floor 3! 
-----------
PARKING
There's a parking lot across the street which you can book in advance on an app.  It doesn't get much easier than that in Chicago.  Street parking is hard to find and not recommended.
----------
CHECK-IN TIME 
Typically, guests may receive the keys and drop their bags in the apartment as early as 12PM (noon). The cleaners do need until 4PM to do their work. 
If you'd like to drop your bags early, we can usually accommodate you!
If you'd like to take a nap or shower right away, and the night before your stay isn't booked yet, let's discuss booking that night before! Then you could arrive as early as you'd like that day! 
----------
CHECK-OUT TIME
11AM is check-out. If you'll need a check-out after 11AM, and the night after your stay isn't booked yet, let's chat about booking that next night! Then you could leave as late as you'd like that day!
Unfortunately we *do not* have anywhere to hold bags after your stay - sorry!
----------
ROLLAWAY BED
The twin rollaway bed is prepared before every stay with fresh linens.
The bed is physically locked into the upright position to help make the bed super easy to move around, and placed in the closet. Simply roll it into place and open. Everything will be ready for you. 
----------
OCCUPANCY 
Upon booking, your reservation will have paid for a specific number of guests on it. Anyone over this number whether visiting or sleeping,  you must have written permission from us. We have a hallway camera to verify. We're going to be totally fine with 95% of requests, but we do require you to clear it with us first. 
We consider the maximum capacity of the apartment to be its sleeping capacity - five individuals. Anyone past five would not be permitted. 
Enjoy the city! Please don‚Äôt bring a party back..
----------
RATES
Rates and minimum stays change constantly - every night is different! 
The nightly rate may change based on number of guests, which is verified upon arrival. Please do your best to let me know how many guests will be staying in advance!
----------
The pictures you see have accurate furniture, appliances, finishes, square footage - really everything! The art and positioning of items *might* be slightly different. Please don‚Äôt be concerned! Read the reviews! I assure you that the photos accurately represent what you will receive!

The entire apartment is yours during your stay! Book for one person or five, it doesn't matter - you WILL NOT share this apartment with anyone outside of your own group! 

The sundeck, gym, and lobby are shared spaces, and you should be respectful of that. 

Guests may drop off their bags as early as 12PM (noon), and the cleaners may still be in the apartment until 4PM.

Unit may be accessed by maintenance for repairs during stays.

We love our guests! We are available to our guests! 
We text our guests most of what they need! 
...WE NEED A NUMBER TO REACH YOU AT! 
Please confirm your phone number and email address upon booking.

IF YOU WILL NOT HAVE A US PHONE NUMBER, please download the WHATSAPP phone texting app! We also have WeChat - please provide your ID!

Clark and Belmont: the intersection of convenience and incredible city life! 
The Chicago Cubs play in the heart of this residential neighborhood, bringing a vibrancy far beyond the tourist/business district downtown.. Chicago‚Äôs North Side is the most prosperous with the most things to do, and this neighborhood is it's beating heart. Wrigleyville might look like it‚Äôs off center from downtown, but it‚Äôs really in the middle of everything. 

- Four blocks from Wrigley FIeld and the Chicago Cubs! Avoid game-day traffic and walk it - or take the train just one L stop! 
- Around the corner from Boystown, Chicago's famed LGBTQ neighborhood! Ask us for suggestions, don't be shy!
- Directly above Target - grocery runs couldn't be quicker
- Leisurely walk to Lake Michigan and the beautiful Lakeshore Path

Stay smack in the middle of the best bar scene on the north side! Sports bars, nightclubs, dance parties, karaoke - anything you want, Lakeview's got it. Perfect for a quick drink or last call. 

With so many bars, restaurants, and shops, you'll have no idea where to start - until you check out our curated guidebook! We'll give you a taste for starters.
CHEESIES, a casual bar three minutes away, has killer grilled cheese. The Popper is the best choice on the menu. We've only been after a few drinks, but we see people there all day. Good sign. 
11 DEGREE NORTH, across the street, has the most wonderful stuffed arepas and biscuit sandwiches made from scratch. This Venezuelan cafe is perfect for breakfast and brunch. Get the Pelua arepa, pot roast and cheese in a corn bread-like pocket.
THE CHICAGO DINER is the city's best vegetarian restaurant. Grab a vegan milkshake or the chicken-style pot pie.

We‚Äôve got tips about the best bars in Wrigleyville and Boystown, coffee shops and grab-and-go breakfast, high-end can't miss dinners, quick meals, late nights and boozy brunch, plus extensive day trips all throughout the city - plus what we consider the best Cubs game day experience. One word: bleachers. We put our heart into the guidebook, and you‚Äôll find advice on other can‚Äôt-miss places worth a train or Uber ride, including FIVE distinct nightlife districts throughout the city!

There's no need for a car here! 
- Two minute walk from the single most convenient public transit spot in Chicago - the Belmont Red Line L station!  Front door to downtown in 18 minutes flat!
Front door to Evanston in 20 minutes! (rush / express hours)
- INSTANTLY get an Uber or Lyft! This neighborhood has no waiting.


Take the CTA and go from front door to Chicago's... 

FRIENDLY CONFINES
- Cubs baseball, Wrigley Field: 6 min bus or L train,  or 11 min walk! 
Just 1 L stop, 4 bus stops, or a half-mile walk through Wrigleyville!

SELFIE SPOTS
- Millennium Park, the Bean (Cloud Gate), Maggie Daley Park: 22 min
- Sears Tower / Willis Tower (Skydeck Chicago): 25 min
- Magnificent Mile / Michigan Avenue shopping, Hancock Center (360 Chicago), Water Tower: 22 min
- Riverwalk: 18 min
- Lake Michigan, Belmont Harbor: 12 min

WORLD-CLASS CULTURAL INSTITUTIONS
- Grant Park, Buckingham Fountain, Chicago Marathon start: 25 min
- Art Institute of Chicago: 22 min
- Museum Campus, Field Museum, Shedd Aquarium, Adler Planetarium: 34 min
- Lincoln Park Zoo: 18 min (best free zoo in the world!)
- Chicago Symphony Orchestra: 22 min
- Gene Siskel Film Center: 16 min
- Museum of Contemporary Art: 21 min
- Museum of Science and Industry (MSI): 24 min Uber
- Music Box Theatre: 14 min

BIGGEST THEATER SCENE OUTSIDE OF BROADWAY
- The Second City: 18 min
- The Chicago Theatre: 16 min
- The Joffrey Ballet: 17 min
- Goodman Theatre: 18 min
- CIBC Theatre (Hamilton): 19 min
- Auditorium Theater of Roosevelt University: 23 min
- Lyric Opera: 26 min
- Lookingglass Theater Company: 19 min
- Steppenwolf Theatre: 13 min

SPORTS AND STADIUMS
- Blackhawks Hockey, Bulls basketball, United Center: 43 min or 26 min Uber
- Bears football, Soldier Field: 34 min
- Guaranteed Rate Field, Chicago White Sox: 31 min (we're Cubs fans, but they have good food, and tickets are cheap)
- Northerly Island Pavilion: 38 min
- Wintrust Arena: 32 min

CONCERTS AND FESTIVALS
- The Vic Theatre: 5 min WALK!
- Schubas Tavern: 5 min
- Metro: 8 min
- Lincoln Hall: 12 min
- The Aragon Ballroom: 14 min
- The Riviera Theatre (Riv): 14 min
- The Green Mill Jazz Club: 14 min
- House of Blues: 21 min
- Lollapalooza: 26 min

UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES
- DePaul University: 12 min
- Northwestern University, Evanston: 32 min (purple line express), 24 min Uber
- University of Illinois at Chicago (UIC): 43 min, 22 min Uber
- The University of Chicago: 24 min Uber

CONVENTION CENTERS
- Merchandise Mart: 18 min
- McCormick Place: 43 min,  20 min Uber

AIRPORTS AND TRANSPORTATION
- O'Hare (ORD): 55 min
- Midway (MDW): 49 min
- Union Station (Amtrak): 30 min
- Millennium Station (South Shore Line): 22 min
- Ogilvie Transportation Center (Metra): 29 min

OVERRATED TOURIST TRAP
- Navy Pier: 36 min
Unless you have plans at the Children's Museum, Shakespeare Theater, or Imax theater - seriously, skip it. Ask us for recommendations instead.

Unit may be accessed by maintenance for repairs during stays.

We guarantee smoke free rooms.  We use real time chemical air analysis to detect the concentration and location of marijuana and tobacco molecules.

We do not accept instant bookings from residents of the Chicago metropolitan area as identified by profile city or phone number area code. If you live near Chicago and would like to book a stay, please send us a message with a little more information about your plans

Immediately after booking, we will send you a few questions about your arrival time, contact info, number of guests/visitors, and to name our favorite restaurant, which is listed at the bottom of the house rules. Guests will not be allowed to check in without providing complete answers
house_rules:
1) The entire property is smoke and vapor free. We have marijuana and tobacco chemical sensors on the property. They know it's not cooking smoke, They react to airborne particulate, not the smell on your clothes. The PolySens¬Æ technology works, so exit the building if you want to smoke/vape or you'll be fined $500 and asked to leave.

2) Your reservation has paid for a specific number of guests on it. Anyone over this number, whether visiting or sleeping, you must have written permission from us. We have a hallway camera to verify. We're going to be totally fine with 95% of requests, but we do require you to clear it with us first.

3) Quiet hours are 10PM-8AM. Noise should not be heard coming from your apartment. This is a quiet residential building. 95% of our guests have no issues, and never hear from us. We will be sure to send you at least 2 warnings prior to asking anyone to leave, but one way or another, the apartment must be quiet.

4) Parties, events, and commercial activity are not allowed.

5) We reserve the right to ask you to leave without a refund if any of the above rules are broken.

6) Lost keys will incur a $100 charge. We have to change the locks. Please use the app to send a picture of all the keys at check-in AND check-out.

7) We do not accept instant bookings from residents of the Chicago metropolitan area as identified by profile city or phone number area code. If you live near Chicago and would like to book a stay, please send us a message with a little more information about your plans.

8) Our favorite restaurant in Chicago is La Scarola.


Privacy Statement on the Use of Security Cameras:
We respect and value the privacy of our guests. We will never place a camera inside a living space. While Airbnb policy allows cameras in spaces that are not used for sleeping or bathing, we disagree. Cameras should be banned from inside all living spaces. Footage should be automatically deleted. Everything should be disclosed in advance. We use hallway security cameras to verify the number of guests who have entered an apartment. This is useful for stopping parties, and under additional prices extra guest charges may apply for extra people sleeping over.  All footage is deleted automatically after a stay, unless there is an open resolution center case. It‚Äôs unfortunate that not every guest is honest about their intentions, and our community would not allow us to be on Airbnb if we did not prevent unwanted behaviors. Let us know if you have questions. We have nothing to hide.

access: Guest has full exclusive access to the condo unit.
description:
Beautiful, newly renovated 2 bedroom 1 bath condo located in the heart of Chicago Chinatown. Minutes to Downtown, McCormick Place, South Loop, Lake Michigan, Museum Campus, UIC, IIT, UofC, and Downtown Universities. Walking distance to public transportation (bus, train), grocery store, bank/ATM, Starbucks, hardware store, hair salon, pharmacy, and tons of good restaurants.

Suite has all amenities including tables, dining table, sofa, chair, high-speed WIFI internet access, and a 48" flat screen smart TV with ROKU.

Guest has full exclusive access to the condo unit.

I give my guests space but am available when needed

Chinatown
Chicago‚Äôs Chinatown is one of the largest neighborhoods of its kind in the US. Located on the city‚Äôs near South Side, the vibrant and energetic culture is reflected in the area‚Äôs many specialty shops, cultural cuisine and signature landmarks, like Ping Tom Memorial Park and a Buddhist Temple.
The main drag of Wentworth Avenue is a dim sum drenched display of Chinese food perfection. Along this epic street, you will discover restaurants, distinctive boutique shopping and the Chinatown Gate, a beautifully ornamented entryway to the neighborhood.
Just north of the Wentworth Avenue District is Chinatown Square, the largest Chinese mall in the Midwest. Besides hosting top restaurants, like Ken Kee, Phoenix or Lao Sze Chuan, you will find an incredible collection of public art that includes zodiac-inspired animal sculptures and twin pagodas. The area's signature piece, an enormous tile mosaic created by celebrated artists Yan Dong and Zhou Ping, represents the accomplishments of Chinese people in America. Rather poetically, the mural embodies the neighborhood as a significant gift to Chicago.

We're conveniently located near the intersection of Cermak Road and Wentworth Ave. Public transportation (bus, train) are less than a block away. Major highways  (I-90/94, I-290, I-55) all converge in this area. For the foodies, this is the place to be with many restaurants within walking distance and close by the downtown and South Loop area. Conventioneers will be glad to know that McCormick Place is a 16 minute walk/6 minutes drive away. See below for more details.

Driving distance to nearby Points of Interest:
Greektown (2.6 miles / 14 min)
Guaranteed Rate Field (1.2 miles / 5 min)
Illinois Institute of Technology (1.6 miles / 7 min)
Lincoln Park Zoo (7.8 miles / 20 min)
Little Italy (2.6 miles / 14 min)
Magnificent Mile (3.5 miles / 11 min)
McCormick Place (0.9 miles / 6 min)
Millennium Park (2.7 miles / 11 min)
Museum Campus (Aquarium, Field Museum, Adler Planetarium) - (1.8 miles / 10 min)
Navy Pier (5 miles / 15 min)
Soldier Field 2.3 miles / 7 min)
United Center (4 miles / 15 min)
University of Illinois at Chicago (2.7 miles / 11 min)
Wrigley Field (10.4 miles / 27 min)

Walking
Many of the city‚Äôs top attractions are a short walk or ride away from each other. Weather-permitting, walking is the best way to see the city and the hidden treasures of architecture and public art in the downtown area.
When planning your route, keep in mind that every 8 blocks equals 1 mile.

Chicago Public Transportation (CTA)
The buses and trains of the CTA (Chicago Transit Authority) are a fast and cost-effective way to get into and around the city. Known as the ‚ÄúL‚Äù (though they may be elevated or underground) the trains are a fun way to see The Loop from a new vantage point.
CTA visitor passes offer the best value, with unlimited rides on all CTA trains and buses. A 1-day pass is $10, a 3-day pass is $20, and a 7-day pass is $28.
Passes are easy to use. They activate the first time you use them and are valid for the number of consecutive days purchased. Just dip your pass into the bus fare machine or the train station turnstile.
Check the CTA website for the latest fares, travel alerts, and trip planners.

Taxis
Taxis are abundant throughout most of Chicago so finding a cab is typically easy. Taxi rates depend on gas prices and number of passengers and can get a bit pricey but provide a fast and convenient way to get around the city, particularly beyond downtown.

Biking
If time and weather permit, consider renting a bike. Chicago‚Äôs lakefront boasts 26 uninterrupted miles of easy bike and walking trails.
Half-day rentals are available from Bike and Roll at Navy Pier and Millennium Park.


From the Airports

O‚ÄôHare International Airport: 
Chicago‚Äôs O‚ÄôHare is one of the world‚Äôs busiest airports. It‚Äôs about 15 miles northwest of the Loop in downtown Chicago. O‚ÄôHare has 5 terminals, all of which have information booths and multilingual employees to assist you.

Midway International Airport:
Although it‚Äôs smaller than O‚ÄôHare, Midway is closer to the Loop and services more discount airlines (but fewer airlines overall). If you‚Äôre looking for a good deal on plane tickets, check out flights to Midway.

‚Ä¢ Check-in time 3 PM or later
‚Ä¢ Check-out before 12 PM
‚Ä¢ No Smoking (including e-cigarettes) in the house and common areas
‚Ä¢ No pets
‚Ä¢ No parties or events
‚Ä¢ Observe quiet hours from 9:00PM to 7:00AM 
‚Ä¢ Early check-in or late check-out can be accommodated based on occupancy and for a small fee. Please inquire if needed

highlights: [{'type': 'LISTING_ENTIRE_HOME_PROPERTY_TYPE', 'message': 'You‚Äôll have the condominium to yourself.', 'headline': 'Entire home'}]
description:
Live in a wonderful part of River North.  This fully furnished two-bedroom, two-bathroom corner unit is the perfect size for one or two people who would like a place in Chicago for work or for fun.  This unit has previously been a corporate rental, so it is well equipped for the solo business traveler or a business person with family.  The building features a 24 hour doorman, fitness room and bike room.  6 month minimum stay per condo guidelines. Discount for 1 year or longer leases.

The living and dining rooms flow together; featuring Brazilian cherry hardwood flooring, a flat screen cable-equipped TV, Wi-Fi, and a fireplace, but the most stunning feature may be the sweeping views of the city from the living room and balcony. The two bedrooms are spacious and outfitted with queen beds. A washer and dryer in the unit, and the provided weekly maid cleaning service will make life easy.

description:
This is a entire top-floor attic apartment. It is a  cozy, bright and clean oasis in a classic Chicago bungalow house.
We have a queen size bed with movable base, a private bath (with a bathtub, but no shower) .There is a small living room space with a TV and comfy couches and a large desk that is perfect to use as a remote work space. 
The apartment is perfect for 1 or 2 people who appreciate their peace, quite and privacy  but might also enjoy having a local host available around .

We interact with you, our guests, as little or as much as you are comfortable with. We will meet you at arrival and be available to answer any questions you might have. We live on the main floor of the house and are available if you need but mostly we like to allow you privacy and relaxation as our guest.

We are about 20 minutes from O'Hare airport and from downtown 25 to 35 minutes depending on the traffic, close to malls, restaurants, drugstore within 2 blocks, Target within 1 block.

access: Roof deck, balcony.
description:
Spacious loft with high timber ceiling, balcony & large windows. Airy & bright with easy street parking.  5-min walk to the Blue line that takes you to the Loop (downtown) in 20 min. Elevated park & bike path (606) is across the street.

I moved to Chicago from NYC for a Job and have been living in both cities ever-since which makes my home in chicago available quite often .  This loft is just that, a home, it is not a corporate rental.  we live here and the atmosphere of the apartment is reflective of our life.  I love art, antiques and unique items which you will find all around the apartment.  
Our neighborhood is quite a trendy area with great small and unique shops, restaurants and bars. 

I have been exchanging and renting for the many years and couldn't have had better experiences each and every time. I look forward to meeting you should you decide to stay at my home while in Chicago!

Roof deck, balcony.

Available for questions by text and phone.

Our neighborhood is quite a trendy area with lots of unique boutiques, small shops, restaurants. Bucktown, Logan square and wicker park neighborhoods are in walking distance. 
The 606 which is an elevated park/bike trail is across the street.

there is free, easy and available street parking.  The Blue line (L) is a 5-minute walk which will take you to the Loop (downtown) in 20 minutes.

description:
Cozy one bedroom with access to mini kitchen, family room and the back yard. Steps away from bus and easy access to trains. You'll love staying in this space where you can relax and enjoy piece of mind. My home is located on a safe, quiet street near restaurants and supermarkets. 2 minutes walk to bus stop and a 40 minute train ride to Downtown Chicago.

Cozy bedroom #3, in private home with access to mini kitchen, bathroom and family room. Relax and enjoy in this amazing place where you can unwind after a long day of exploring Chicago.

access: Guests are welcome on the main floor, back shared deck and lower level floor.
description: Indulge in the splendor of this debonair home. The unit features a private en suite bathroom, chic furnishings, and access to shared spaces including an expansive living room with a fireplace, and an outdoor patio lounge.
interaction: Our family will be here to ensure your comfort.
neighborhood_overview: The property is close to Wrigley Field, Brownline train station, Southport restaurants, Boystown, and much more.
space: A new World Series private room just a quick 15 minute walk from Wrigley and located in the heart of the Southport Corridor. Shared 1st floor features eat-in kitchen open to a large family room leading to a raised terrace. Private lower level has heated floors and two guests suites plus a family room/theatre room along with a wet bar. 1 car garage spot available with rental.
summary: Indulge in the splendor of this debonair home. The unit features a private en suite bathroom, chic furnishings, and access to shared spaces including an expansive living room with a fireplace, and an outdoor patio lounge.
transit: Our home is a short one city block away from the Southport Brown-line stop making it fast and affordable to experience the many diverse areas of our beautiful city.

access: The entire apartment is available for your use.
description:
This 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment is located in one of the trendiest neighborhoods in Chicago, Bucktown.
Far enough from downtown traffic but close enough that anywhere you want to go is just a few minutes away by cab or train. Bucktown is known for it's stylish boutiques, electric cafes, fun pubs & great summer festivals. A great neighborhood for food and fun all year long!

Large bedroom with a queen size bed and a walk-in closet to hang your clothes on the top floor. Fully stocked kitchen with a Keurig to make a quick cup of coffee. Otherwise, you can walk down to the block the local Starbucks or discover all the boutique coffee shops throughout the neighborhood. 
Large and comfortable couch with a pull out bed. Smart TV along with Wifi throughout the apartment.

The entire apartment is available for your use.

please feel free to message, text, or call if needed

Located in a quiet neighborhood with ample free parking. Apartment is located the top floor and does require to walk up stairs.

access: Access is available to the entire apartment unit.
description:
Perched on the edge of Lincoln Park & Lakeview,  this airy walk-up is full of charm. Just a short walk to vibrant bars and restaurants - or to the DePaul University campus.  Consider walking to some of the great local theaters and comedy cellars that make Chicago improv famous!

This three bedroom home includes a full bath, kitchen and dining table with high top seating, and a spacious living room basked in natural light. The unit accommodates six guests with two comfy Queen size beds plus additional sleeping space on the living room couch.

Access is available to the entire apartment unit.

We will be available throughout your stay to recommend local attractions, dining, nightlife, or any other concierge services that interest you.

This apartment is in the heart of the bustling Lincoln Park and Lake view neighborhood. You are within minutes of Wrigley, DePaul, hundreds of bars and nightlife spots, Boys Town and more!

Cab/Uber service is easily available in this location and is our recommended method of transportation to nearby hotspots such as Old Town to the south and Wicker Park/Bucktown to the west. The apartment is also close to the Diversey Brown Line.

We are not responsible for packages if they are unable to be delivered. If anything is not to your liking, please notify us, and we will correct the situation as soon as possible!
house_rules:
1. No onsite parking
2. No late checkout past 11am
3. Quiet time after 10pm
4. ONLY guests included on the reservation are permitted on the premises
5. Lost or misplaced keys will be charged at cost (up to $100)
6. We are not responsible for packages if they are unable to be delivered

We look forward to hosting you!  If you are unable to abide by house rules, please consider another listing as we reserve the right to end your stay early for serious violations.  We take pride in our home and are excited to welcome you, but please respect the space and others who live in the building.

3 mins walk to UNIVERSITY OF CHICAGO Campus

Free street parking.

-Kodi TV 

If you need accommodations outside of the check in or check out times just ask!

The apartment is generally quiet and peaceful as guest are usually students and professionals

description:
Welcome to Chicago! 

Our Central Stylish 3bed/1bath unit is perfect for both leisure & business travelers.

More information

We are conveniently located between O'hare & Downtown in the very safe Jefferson Park Neighborhood and short distance to Jefferson Park Transit Center (Trains) & Highways.

-Professionally designed space with modern furniture. 

-The entire unit is for your own use. 

-50" Flat Screen TV in the living room with Unlimited Netflix streaming.

-Brand new Whirlpool stainless steel appliances in the kitchen, including Refrigerator, Microwave, & Stove/Oven Range.

-Sleep in a comfortable Gel Infused Queen Size beds in the bedrooms, and the living room sofa converts into a futon bed.

-Basic Dinnerware, Cutlery, Drinking Glasses, and Pots & Pans provide.

-We provide towels, toilet paper, and shampoo for your use.

-We have shared coin laundry on premise. You may use it at your convenience. Detergent is not provided by the host.

-Please note this unit is located on the first floor.

-Unit Access is through the front of the property.

-Guests will access their unit through a private entrance. Instructions will be given 3 days prior to stay.

-Guest will get one parking spot in Rear Garage. Code will be provided 3 days before stay. However guest will have to enter through the front of the property, even though you park in the rear garage.

We are available by phone throughout your stay. You can simply call or text if you have any questions.

Our condo is a 30-minute drive northwest of Downtown Chicago, conveniently situated to give you a nice balance between exciting city life and relaxed suburban vibes. It‚Äôs close enough to the city for weekday commutes yet far enough to give you space to relax after a long week. And with a grocery store right across the street, you will always be minutes away from food or any other necessities you may need throughout your stay. 

More information

If you enjoy cooking, we have a Jewel-Osco grocery store right across the street. They sell fresh produce, countless snacks, and have a fantastic beer, wine, and spirits collection. So if you‚Äôre craving an afternoon libation but don‚Äôt want to venture far, you‚Äôre in luck!

Within half a mile you will find two local restaurants where you can enjoy a meal with locals. The first is the Gale Street Inn Chicago. This neighborhood rib joint has been serving signature ribs in a friendly atmosphere since 1963. And if you can‚Äôt make their 3pm-5:45pm happy hour, no need to worry, the happiness continues from 9pm-11pm at the bar.

Another local favorite is Galvin's Public House. This family-owned Irish pub loves serving up pints, showing sports games, and entertaining guests with their live DJ nights. They have daily drink and food specials, so be sure to check their website for an updated listing. Oh, and did we mention they have a fireplace in the dining room?

Craving some international cuisine? Pho No.1 Vietnamese Cuisine is right around the corner from Galvin‚Äôs. Pho No. 1 is where you can grab a quick, healthy bite and be in and out in no time. They have a variety of healthy options and are known for their large portions and fast service.

Jefferson Park is a 6 min walk from our place and is a nice little spot to relax on the weekends. Grab a picnic lunch and enjoy reading a book while you soak up some sunshine. You might also be lucky enough to stumble upon their Sunday farmer‚Äôs market. Roberts Square Park is just under a mile but worth the trip. The park‚Äôs lush green grass makes it perfect for people watching or getting in a refreshing run.

Our place is a 12-minute drive from O‚ÄôHare International Airport and a short drive into Downtown Chicago.

Although we have a Jewel-Osco grocery store across the street and some restaurants nearby, we recommend either renting a car or taking rideshares (Uber or Lyft). Having access to a vehicle, whether your own or a rideshare, will most definitely make your stay more enjoyable. Within a 10-minute ride from our place, you will have access to a variety of different restaurants and public parks. And the Kennedy Expressway (I-90/94) is only 3 minutes away.

If you‚Äôre going to be making weekly trips into Downtown and looking for convenience, driving will take anywhere from 45 minutes to 90 minutes depending on traffic. Although we offer free parking in a garage, taking the train into Downtown might be your best bet. From our place, it‚Äôs a nice 10-minute walk to Jefferson Park Station, then a 30-minute ride into the city.

-There is street parking on adjacent blocks on Giddings Street & Leland Avenue. Do not park on Central Avenue as there are several tow zones.

-NO Baths in the tub. Bathroom is meant for SHOWER use only.

-All guests need to be attentive to the house rules during their stay, as we have other tenants at the property. 

-All guests must be mindful of walking hard or running in the unit, to not disturb the guests below.

-Bath towels are provided per number of guest not per number of stay
-Washcloths are not provided during your stay. You may send me a message though if you need them and I'll try my best to accommodate your request.
-We have duvet covers on our beddings  (no top sheets).
-A Security Deposit may be required on some bookings. 
-If there's an issue during your stay, please report it real time so we can address it right away.


-The owner of the building has 2 security cameras on the Exterior of the Building on the Front Court Yard and Back Yard.

-Guest parking in the Parking garage will get one spot. They will still have to enter from the front of the property.

access: You will have your own spacious  heated/air-conditioned private suite including comfortable seating area (sofas and chair) with coffee table and wide screen TV.  Spacious bedroom with extremely comfortable queen size bed with memory foam mattress and luxury bedding. Ample closet space with drawers and hangers. Separate writing desk and captains chair (free hi speed internet access).  Beautiful full bathroom with sink and walk-in shower. Towels and bathroom accessories are provided. Constant hot water. Kitchenette/dining area equipped with coffee/tea making facilities (complimentary coffee and tea), toaster, microwave oven, large fridge, water filter and all usual kitchen accompaniments. (Note: there is no stove).
description:
Guests are invited to enjoy an immaculate & spacious private suite in a newly renovated historic Chicago red brick (c.1903). 

Comprises spacious bedroom with comfortable queen bed, plenty of storage, cosy living area with widescreen TV (cable), desk, private bathroom, kitchenette/diner. Free Wifi. Access to parking.

Blocks from lake with easy access to Red line L & Metra.  Close to grocery store/coffee shop and variety of nearby restaurants & bars to enjoy.

Must be ok with dogs, as we have 2!

Immaculate and new - comfortable, incredibly spacious and beautifully appointed private luxury accommodation following a major renovation. Cosy bedroom (all new) , adjoining private bathroom, kitchenette/dining area, comfortable lounge seating (sofas) with TV (free cable and net channels). Free high-speed internet. Ideal for tourists, language students, visiting professionals or anyone looking to experience this beautiful leafy lakeside neighborhood.

You will have your own spacious  heated/air-conditioned private suite including comfortable seating area (sofas and chair) with coffee table and wide screen TV.  Spacious bedroom with extremely comfortable queen size bed with memory foam mattress and luxury bedding. Ample closet space with drawers and hangers. Separate writing desk and captains chair (free hi speed internet access).  Beautiful full bathroom with sink and walk-in shower. Towels and bathroom accessories are provided. Constant hot water. Kitchenette/dining area equipped with coffee/tea making facilities (complimentary coffee and tea), toaster, microwave oven, large fridge, water filter and all usual kitchen accompaniments. (Note: there is no stove).

Whilst we like to respect your privacy. we are also very happy to interact with our guests.  We can always be reached by phone call or text.

Rogers Park is an established neighborhood on the far north side of Chicago close to North Western University and Loyola University.  We are located in a historic red-brick house on a beautiful leafy tree-lined avenue a short walk from the lakefront (Leone beach) - check out the beautiful sunrise over the lake - it‚Äôs a lovely walk!

The house is very close to both a Red Line L stop on Jarvis and CTA Metra UP-N stop on Greenleaf, which are equidistant (both are appx. 6 mins walk). The Metra will take you into Ogilvie station, whereas the Red Line (for appx $3) stops at key areas all the way into the heart of downtown Chicago - easy access to Wrigleyville for you Cubs fans, Belmont, Fullerton, Lincoln Park, Clark/Division, Grand/State, Chicago/State, Grand/State, Lake, Monroe, and beyond.

Please note that this a non-smoking house.

Access to laundry facilities (washer / dryer)  is available for longer stays - please ask for details.

There is on-premise parking for one guest car - please check for availability. If this is occupied, there is free street parking all around.
house_rules: - As this a private home, we hope that you will appreciate that we do not allow visitors outside of registered guests.

space: Immaculate and new - comfortable, incredibly spacious and beautifully appointed private luxury accommodation following a major renovation. Cosy bedroom (all new) , adjoining private bathroom, kitchenette/dining area, comfortable lounge seating (sofas) with TV (free cable and net channels). Free high-speed internet. Ideal for tourists, language students, visiting professionals or anyone looking to experience this beautiful leafy lakeside neighborhood.
summary:
Guests are invited to enjoy an immaculate & spacious private suite in a newly renovated historic Chicago red brick (c.1903). 

Comprises spacious bedroom with comfortable queen bed, plenty of storage, cosy living area with widescreen TV (cable), desk, private bathroom, kitchenette/diner. Free Wifi. Access to parking.

Blocks from lake with easy access to Red line L & Metra.  Close to grocery store/coffee shop and variety of nearby restaurants & bars to enjoy.

Must be ok with dogs, as we have 2!

summary:
My place is in the heart of Chinatown resident area. 
Entire apartment in 2rd floor with 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom.

If you need any laundry, there is a laundry room for my guests within 3mins walk.

It is closed to Cermak-Chinatown Redline Station. Several bus stations are within in 5mins walk.
15 mins to Loop and McCormick Place.

You can enjoy every type of Chinese food in Chinatown.

If you are a group up to 18 people, please contact me to see whether the entire building is available.

description:
This is our 3 bedroom/2 bathroom fully furnished apartment in the heart of Roscoe Village. Whether you‚Äôre planning a weekend excursion, business trip or need a comfortable place to stay for family or friends, consider our newly rehabbed Guesthouse.

Amenities include: 
3 bedrooms (2 Queen & 1 full size bed, one pull out full couch, sleeps total of 8 people) 
2 Full bathrooms with plush towels & toiletries 
Fully equipped kitchen with granite & stainless steel appliances 
Quality linens 
Newly rehabbed and furnished 
Flat screen plasma TV 
Hardwood floors throughout 
Fireplace 
Second floor apt with back Deck 
Access to landscaped backyard with gas grill

You will have the entire second floor apartment.

We are a full service vacation rental agency, with a virtual front desk and concierge.

Trendy Roscoe Village offers boutique shopping and a variety of restaurants & bars.

Approx .7 miles from Paulina ‚ÄúEl‚Äù stop which will take you downtown or catch a bus half block away that will take you to the Belmont 'El' stop.

We do have a 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom unit in the same building that could sleep an additional 8 guests. The property can accommodate up to 16 total guests. We have another property within walking distance that can accommodate an additional 22 guests.

access: We have a shared gym on the 5th floor.  Take the elevator to 5, go left and left again.  (Please be very quiet through the corridor) go through the common area back into the gym.  You will need the supplied key fob.
description:
Our home is a lovely city terrace modern loft in a quiet nook of the Fulton Market / West Loop Area.  Furnished beautifully for working from home or coming home from work.  Home experience was always kept in mind.  We have the best of the best when it comes to our home.  Digital light controls, Sony 65‚Äù TV, Sonos BEAM, smart lock,  solid marble dining table with modern chairs, extremely comfortable bed and pillows, and quality sheets for a great nights sleep

We have everything you'll need from our home to host a cozy stay while you are in town.  Parties are not allowed however you may have a total of 4 guests (two couples)  maximum.

-digital lock app controlled 
- coffee maker 
- Dimmable lighting 
Excellent bathroom lighting.  Kohler, grohe, and Toto used throughout bathroom.

We have a shared gym on the 5th floor.  Take the elevator to 5, go left and left again.  (Please be very quiet through the corridor) go through the common area back into the gym.  You will need the supplied key fob.

This is an in-town home for us, I am available during your stay by phone and in person when I am in town.  If I am out of town there will be a co-host that will be around should you need anything.

The area hosts the Finest Restaurants,  and cocktail bars, offices, and homes. The west loop is formerly the meat-packing district of Chicago.  Transformed by a growing tech migration into Chicago, led by Google, Mcdonalds, Walgreens, etc.  You'll find this an idea place to stay if you're coming into Chicago for short or long term trips, with easy access to and from all public transit.  Get to the suburbs quickly if you want to stay in the city via the Metro train, or opt into a stay in the city at our personal home while we are away and take care of business matters while enjoy the neighborhood dining scene.

We are located near public transit just blocks away from the train stations (blue line)  A quick 10 minute walk to the merchandise mart will get you to to the train station there.  You can walk to river north, greek town, west loop restaurants, soho house,  lake is an easy 15-20 minute walk.  Return to peace to our ground floor terrace unit with no waiting for elevators.  Wheelchair accessible.

Short walk to the river walk, theater district, restaurant district, river north.   Metra and CTA train stations.  Grocery, Starbucks, ATM just a short 1 minute walk away.  Paid heated Garage parking across the front of the building, as well as paid open lot parking.  Really cool bars and restaurant with limitless choices.  Really an awesome location.

transit: We are located near public transit just blocks away from the train stations (blue line)  A quick 10 minute walk to the merchandise mart will get you to to the train station there.  You can walk to river north, greek town, west loop restaurants, soho house,  lake is an easy 15-20 minute walk.  Return to peace to our ground floor terrace unit with no waiting for elevators.  Wheelchair accessible.

additional_house_rules:
1. The picture of downtown is not the view from the loft. It is just a picture. The loft is located a half block east from the cross streets of Clark and Devon (6400 N Clark St.). 
2. You will have to walk-up 20 steps to enter the loft. There are 4 rooms in the loft, all spaced out from each other. i live in the loft and have a roommate. The other two rooms are for AirBnB. Often times guests have the loft to themselves. 
3. If you are not able to be flexible with your check in/check out time, i encourage you to send me a message BEFORE booking to make sure that your desired check-in/check-out times are available. If you do not send me a message AND hear back a confirmation, then upon booking, you are in full agreement of a flexible check-in/check-out time. 
4. You may not enter the loft before i send you a message confirming your check-in/check-out time or before you are scheduled to check-in. You may not stay in the loft after your scheduled check-out time. 
5. If you check-out later than 10 minutes past your scheduled check-out time, you will be charged a $25.00 late check-out fee. You will be charged an additonal $5.00 for every 10 minutes thereafter. By booking this listing, you fully acknowledge and agree to these fees. Please do not book this listing unless you agree to the late check out fee. 
6. Your room can be locked from the inside, but not the outside. Nonetheless, i have never had a problem with theft/privacy. 420 can be consumed anywhere in the loft, but please smoke cigarettes outside. 
7. The stereo system in the living room, the washer/dryer, and the tolietries in the bathroom are not included in the amenities. Please do not use them without my permission. The living room may not be used for sleeping at any time. Please do not sleep in the living room. Please do not throw any liquids in the garbage can, even if they are in containers. Please do not turn a light off unless you turned it on or unless it is the washroom light. Feel free to turn any light on, but do not turn a light off, unless you turned it on or unless it is the washroom light. 
8. No outside guests are allowed without permission from me first. If you bring someone in the loft without permission, your reservation will be cancelled immediately without refund. 
9. There is free parking right in front of the building Monday - Saturday from 10PM - 8AM and all day on Sunday. During winter months, you have to check the street signs for additional towing violations. During the hours its not free, you have to pay the meter. Nonetheless, there is free parking on all of the side streets. 
11. The loft is a 15-25 min drive to downtown, depending on traffic. It's 35-45 mins via public transportation, depending on time of day. There's plenty of accessible trains/buses near the loft that runs 24/7 and goes down town.

additional_house_rules:
- ALL Guests must be verified with Airbnb prior to booking, and submit government ID upon check-in directly to host to maintain Security and Safety.  NO Exceptions.
- No Parties, Large Gatherings, or Unauthorized guests.  Violations will be dealt with trip termination and 500 dollar fine.
- ALL Guests must be 18+ or accompanied by an adult during stay.
- Quiet Hours from 10pm to 7am.  No Talking in Common Areas of Building, PLEASE respect our neighbors in our building and all surroundings as they live full time here.
- NO Shoes are to be worn inside the Condo, any moisture, scratches, or salt damage to hardwood floors will be deducted from Deposit.
- Absolutely No Illegal Drugs and NO smoking inside, on back balcony, or within 10 feet in front of property.  $1000 dollar fine for any violations. 
- Property is equipped with remote video recording security system (ONLY in common areas of building).  
- NO pets on the premises, NO exceptions.  Any pet violations will incur a $1000 cleaning and sanitation fee and early termination of trip.

description:
Stay at TopChicagoAirbnb‚Ñ¢ - our 1300 SF Little Italy Penthouse Condo
‚òÜPrivate 500 SF Roof Deck & Skyline Views.
‚òÜTucked on a Quiet Beautiful Tree Lined Street. 
‚òÜ2 MEMORY FOAM BEDS, 55" TV, Modern Furnishings.
‚òÜModern Updated Kitchen with Beverage Center & Mini Fridge.
‚òÜGreen Energy Efficient LED Lighting.
‚òÜEasy Public Transport, Numerous Restaurants, 5-10 Minute Uber to Downtown.
‚òÜFREE STREET PARKING Included!
‚òÜLicensed by City of Chicago & Professionally Cleaned / Managed by Airbnb Superhosts!

Feel at home at TopChicagoAirbnb‚Ñ¢ and wake up in the charming Little Italy neighborhood!  It accommodates up to 4-6 guests in two spacious bedrooms equipped with 5 star rated Eight‚Ñ¢ Mattress Queen Memory Foam Beds, with the option of an additional 2 guests on a highly rated SoundAsleep‚Ñ¢ self inflating air mattress in the living area.  There are two spacious bedrooms - one guest bedroom in the front with a full bathroom nearby, and a master bedroom in the rear with attached on-suite full bathroom.  The layout offers privacy for both bedrooms and living areas with Large windows and skylights to provide natural light!  It's furnished with tasteful newer furniture, which makes for a classy space to eat, sleep, and relax. Kick back and Watch TV on the 55" 4K Vizio‚Ñ¢ TV, With Premium Comcast‚Ñ¢ Cable, and Netflix‚Ñ¢ while having a freshly brewed Coffee or Tea from our K Cup Keurig‚Ñ¢ Machine.  Spend time having a drink watching the sunset and skyline views of Chicago on the private rooftop deck.  Cook yourself a light breakfast, lunch, or dinner in the kitchen with all necessary cooking utensils, dinnerware, and silverware.  The Condo is always Professionally Cleaned and Superhost rated 2 years in a row with constant quality control checks by myself and my co-host team.

Guests will have access to the ENTIRE top floor Penthouse Condo!  The space is equipped with an August Smart Lock for easy keyless entry.  The Back Patio is available year round with an additional private roof deck with views of the city is available for use during spring, summer, and winter upon request and host authorization.  Enjoy Chicago Skyline Views like a true local with comfy lounge chairs and table seating!

Guest will be greeted by myself, or one of our wonderful co-hosts!  A simple Lockbox will grant you a physical key to unlock the main building door entrance.  Once you enter the building, our individual Condo door is equipped with a Smart Lock called August‚Ñ¢.  You will be automatically granted a personalized smart code for the digital keypad that works during your reservation to unlock and lock the unit as needed without a physical key.  You can also download the August‚Ñ¢ Smart Lock App on your Smartphone to share with other friends and family during your stay.  This modern digital key system keeps our building safe and secure.

Little Italy is a neighborhood located in downtown Chicago which is home to some of the nation's oldest and most famous Italian restaurants and is located in close proximity to Chicago attractions such as Wills (Sears) Tower, Millenium Park, the Magnificent Mile, Grant Park, the White Sox Stadium, Soldier Field, Navy Pier, The Bean, McCormick Convention Center, West Loop Restaurants, and the United Center. All of these attractions can easily be reached by Uber/Lyft or public transportation. The neighborhood is also in close proximity to the University of Illinois at Chicago as well as area hospitals including UIC Hospital, Rush University Medical Center, Jesse Brown VA Medical Center and Cook County Hospital. Book our space when you come in town to see big shows such as Chicago SummerDance, Chicago Air & Water Show, Chicago Blues Festival, Grant Park Music Festival, Taste of Chicago, Chicago Jazz Festival, Chicago Auto Show, Randolph Street Market Festival, University of Chicago Folk Festival, Chicago Restaurant Week, Lollapalooza, Spring Awakening, ZooLights at Lincoln Park Zoo, Chicago Cubs Convention, Baconfest Chicago, Chicago White Sox Opening Day at Guaranteed Rate Field, Chicago Cubs Opening Day at Wrigley Field, Navy Pier Summer Fireworks, Ribfest Chicago, Chicago Pride Fest, Taste of Chicago, Windy City Smokeout - BBQ and Country Festival, Wicker Park Fest, Chicago Hot Dog Fest, Chicago Marathon, Christkindlmarket Chicago, The Magnificent Mile Lights Festival, and last but Not least, Winter WonderFest at Navy Pier!

The Condo is located on a peaceful street close to downtown without all the hassle of the downtown noise. It's a 5-10 minutes from most major downtown attractions, and less than 3 minutes from highway 290 and highway 90/94. The Pink line train is 2 blocks away, the Blue line is 3 blocks (Direct To and From O'Hare). We are on multiple bus stops within walking distance. The Mega Bus and Grey Hound Bus locations are 5 minutes away. Zipcar rental cars and Turo Car Rentals are available nearby as well and Divy Bike-Share rental Stations are literally on the same block. FREE permitted street parking is available on a first come first serve basis directly on our street - please notify host ahead of time to request passes and follow all directions as listed on pass carefully. Host is not responsible for any tickets and damages arisen.

We Provide Plenty of Eco Frendly, Plush Bamboo Towels, Fresh Premium Bamboo 1000 count Linens, Premium TRESemm√©‚Ñ¢ Shampoo and Conditioner, Premium Organic Vegan Citrus Body Wash,  Blow Dryers, and Iron & Board for your convenience.  Enjoy complimentary snacks as well as K-Cup coffee pods, Teas, and Bottled Water all conveniently located at our beverage and snack center right as you enter the unit!
house_rules:
- ALL Guests must be verified with Airbnb prior to booking, and submit government ID upon check-in directly to host to maintain Security and Safety.  NO Exceptions.
- No Parties, Large Gatherings, or Unauthorized guests.  Violations will be dealt with trip termination and 500 dollar fine.
- ALL Guests must be 18+ or accompanied by an adult during stay.
- Quiet Hours from 10pm to 7am.  No Talking in Common Areas of Building, PLEASE respect our neighbors in our building and all surroundings as they live full time here.
- NO Shoes are to be worn inside the Condo, any moisture, scratches, or salt damage to hardwood floors will be deducted from Deposit.
- Absolutely No Illegal Drugs and NO smoking inside, on back balcony, or within 10 feet in front of property.  $1000 dollar fine for any violations. 
- Property is equipped with remote video recording security system (ONLY in common areas of building).  
- NO pets on the premises, NO exceptions.  Any pet violations will incur a $1000 cleaning and sanitation fee and early termination of trip.

additional_house_rules:
-Guests must read and understand the detailed welcome message and self check in instructions on the Airbnb app. 

-Leave the apartment at least as nice as it was when you arrived.  As the boyscouts say, "try to leave this world a little better than you found it."  This is a more self sufficient Airbnb than many (which is why it is so affordable!) so teamwork is required.  You are expected to clean up after yourself and help contribute to keeping the place clean.  

-Please make the bed with the clean sheets provided before you check out.  Leave your sheets and towels in the hamper.  

-Default check in is 3pm, checkout at 12pm noon.  We are flexible and can easily accommodate early check in and late checkout upon request.

-Shoes off at the door

-Make sure all dishes are washed and put away before checkout

-No unregistered guests are allowed on the property without approval (and obviously no parties!)

-No eating or drinking within the bedrooms. 

-Smoking is not allowed in the property.  If you smoke outside the property, cigarette butts must be discarded in the bucket provided or into your own receptacle.  Do not leave cigarette butts on the ground.

access: Guests are free to jam on our guitars & acoustic piano! We have the fastest WiFi money can buy (Jon does web development).  We have free laundry. The place is borderline *sentient* wired up with smart devices to control everything... Use your voice to automatically control Spotify, Pandora, Netflix, Chromecast, the thermostat, and even the lights! There are tons of toys available for families with toddlers (neatly stored away when not in use). There's a nice little backyard too.
description:
Hi there! Guests love staying at our place because of its absolutely ideal, couldn't-be-more-convenient LOCATION. To explore Chicago, you need to be near the "el" train.  We're blocks from the "blue line", the only train connecting O'hare airport to all the downtown tourist destinations. 30 mins from O'hare & 15 mins from downtown, you'll be perfectly situated for an easy stress-free check-in, and everything you want to experience. You'll have your own, lockable private room with a bed for two.

Our place is a 2 flat grey stone conveniently located on a quiet, tree-lined residential block.

Guests are free to jam on our guitars & acoustic piano! We have the fastest WiFi money can buy (Jon does web development).  We have free laundry. The place is borderline *sentient* wired up with smart devices to control everything... Use your voice to automatically control Spotify, Pandora, Netflix, Chromecast, the thermostat, and even the lights! There are tons of toys available for families with toddlers (neatly stored away when not in use). There's a nice little backyard too.

We're definitely open to socialize and show you around the town but can totally stay out of your way and give you as much space and privacy as you need too.

LOGAN SQUARE ‚Äî Described as the "Midwest headquarters of hip," Logan Square has been named one of the 15 "hottest urban retail markets across North America."

RESTAURANTS:
- Revolution Brewing (lively, chef-driven pub fair) - 0.5mi
-Boiler Room (hippest pizza place in town with lots of craft beer, and a great beer garden) - 0.5mi 
-Lula Cafe (Inventive, market-driven food in a casual, funky space that hosts an especially popular brunch) - 0.7mi
-Reno (Wood-fired pizza, bagels & pasta in a casual, loftlike space with a bar for pastries & alcohol) - 0.7mi
-Longman and Eagle (modern farm-to-table fine dining with a great whiskey/cocktail selection) - 0.9mi
-Donkey Table Stick (upscale comfort fare and drinks in a rustic setting) - 0.8 
-The Radler (wursts and hearty German eats, plus plenty of beers, in a brick walled space covered in street art) - 0.5mi
-Cozy Corner (classic diner serving up hearty breakfast/lunch right next to the train stop) - 0.4
-Margies Candies (Open for more than 90 years, this vintage candy and ice cream shop allegedly played host to a Beatles ice cream sundae party in 1965) - 0.9mi 
-Kuma's Corner (Heavy metal themed burger place. I like the "Slayer") - 1.2mi
Fat Rice - 1.0mi

BARS:
-Emporium (plenty of pool tables, pinball, and air hockey) - 0.5mi
-Spilt Milk (A 1920s pharmacy with an old-school look sets the stage for crafty takes on classic cocktails) - 0.3mi
-Coles (Live music, comedy & open-mic nights are showcased at this laid-back neighborhood dive) - 0.3mi
-The Owl (My favorite, late bar, good coctails, craft beer, hipster dance party)
-Slippery Slope (dance club downstairs, with a quiet and dimly lit craft cocktail bar upstairs) - 0.5mi 
-Scofflaw (national recognized, award-winning craft cocktail bar with lots of cozy nooks and comfortable seating) - 1.3mi

COFFEE:
Gaslight Roasters - 0.4mi
Mustache Cafe - 0.3mi

MUSIC:
-Concord Music Hall (top acts from rock to EDM, 1500 capacity venue) - 0.5mi
-Township (smaller hipster venue) - 0.4mi
-The Whistler (trendy yet laid back bar featuring live music/DJ's nightly with no cover) - 0.5mi
-Rosa's Lounge (classic neighborhood club that features the best is Blues from across the country) - 1.6mi


RECREATION:
-Palmer Square Park (7 acre park featuring a gravel, 1/2 mile running track around its perimeter) - 0.7mi
-606 Trail (a 2.7 mile elevated multi-use trail and park that connects neighborhood after neighborhood in the heart of Chicago) - 0.8mi
-Fireside Bowl (Fireside Bowl is a bowling alley and was a music venue known for for being thee punk rock mecca of the late 90s) - 0.1mi

The Blue Line "el" train is only .4 miles away giving you easy access to the entire city, especially all the hip spots which tend to be along the blue line! Plus it's a straight shot to O'hare Airport. If you have a car, street parking is free and it's typically easy.

My sister is currently staying in one of the three bedrooms and she has two cats.

-Spilt Milk (A 1920s pharmacy with an old-school look sets the stage for crafty takes on classic cocktails) - 0.3mi
-Coles (Live music, comedy & open-mic nights are showcased at this laid-back neighborhood dive) - 0.3mi
-The Owl (My favorite, late bar, good coctails, craft beer, hipster dance party)
-Slippery Slope (dance club downstairs, with a quiet and dimly lit craft cocktail bar upstairs) - 0.5mi 
-Scofflaw (national recognized, award-winning craft cocktail bar with lots of cozy nooks and comfortable seating) - 1.3mi

COFFEE:
Gaslight Roasters - 0.4mi
Mustache Cafe - 0.3mi

MUSIC:
-Concord Music Hall (top acts from rock to EDM, 1500 capacity venue) - 0.5mi
-Township (smaller hipster venue) - 0.4mi
-The Whistler (trendy yet laid back bar featuring live music/DJ's nightly with no cover) - 0.5mi
-Rosa's Lounge (classic neighborhood club that features the best is Blues from across the country) - 1.6mi


RECREATION:
-Palmer Square Park (7 acre park featuring a gravel, 1/2 mile running track around its perimeter) - 0.7mi
-606 Trail (a 2.7 mile elevated multi-use trail and park that connects neighborhood after neighborhood in the heart of Chicago) - 0.8mi
-Fireside Bowl (Fireside Bowl is a bowling alley and was a music venue known for for being thee punk rock mecca of the late 90s) - 0.1mi
notes: My sister is currently staying in one of the three bedrooms and she has two cats.
space: Our place is a 2 flat grey stone conveniently located on a quiet, tree-lined residential block.
summary: Hi there! Guests love staying at our place because of its absolutely ideal, couldn't-be-more-convenient LOCATION. To explore Chicago, you need to be near the "el" train.  We're blocks from the "blue line", the only train connecting O'hare airport to all the downtown tourist destinations. 30 mins from O'hare & 15 mins from downtown, you'll be perfectly situated for an easy stress-free check-in, and everything you want to experience. You'll have your own, lockable private room with a bed for two.
transit: The Blue Line "el" train is only .4 miles away giving you easy access to the entire city, especially all the hip spots which tend to be along the blue line! Plus it's a straight shot to O'hare Airport. If you have a car, street parking is free and it's typically easy.

access: Apartment is located on the 1st floor of quiet, 4-unit building. Lockbox access available. Host lives on premises.
description:
Cozy, sunny 2-bedroom apartment located in Irving Park/Albany Park. Comfortably furnished and conveniently located, close to many ethnic restaurants and popular brewpubs on the north side of Chicago. Explore the nearby neighborhoods or hop a short bus, L train or Uber ride to Wrigley Field, Logan Square, Lincoln Square, downtown and the lakefront. Easy access to both the Blue and Brown lines via Kimball bus, 1/2 block away.

Pet friendly, and pet care can be provided for an additional fee.

The apartment has been recently renovated with attention to preserving its lovely vintage details. Fully furnished with everything you need for a comfortable stay. Living room features a sleeper sofa, cozy electric fireplace, and chess and checker game table. Bedrooms have Beautyrest luxury mattresses, EcoTech certified organic sheets and comforters with linen duvets. Kitchen is fully equipped and features a coffee/tea bar that is also stocked with some breakfast and snack items. There is also a nice selection of games and coloring books for both adults and the little ones! Apartment is located on the 1st floor, and also has a small furnished outdoor deck space.

Apartment is located on the 1st floor of quiet, 4-unit building. Lockbox access available. Host lives on premises.

Host lives on premises and is available via text, phone or email.

Apartment is located on a quiet, tree lined street, in Irving Park. There are many great ethnic restaurants in nearby Albany Park and many popular brewpubs in the area. It is also close to North Park University and Northeastern University. It is two blocks from Arun‚Äôs Thai Restaurant, a destination for fine Thai dining. Cermak Produce grocery store is within walking distance, along with Surge Coffee & Billiards and seasonally, Miko‚Äôs Italian Ice is two block away.

The apartment is very centrally located to many other northside Chicago neighborhoods, including Logan Square, Lincoln Square, Ravenswood, Wrigleyville, Roscoe Village and a quick bus ride to Montrose Beach and the lakefront. The Blue and Brown L lines are easily accessed by the Kimball or Irving Park bus, and can take you downtown or to O‚Äôhare Airport.

Street parking is available, but gets tight late in the evening. Uber and Lyft rides are plentiful as are Grubhub food deliveries. The Kimball bus stops right at the corner will take you to the Blue and Brown L train lines. The Irving Park and Montrose bus lines are a short walk.

Quiet, well-behaved pets are welcome.

additional_house_rules:
Due to past circumstances with some guests, we have had to implement these new house rules. Please read carefully all the house rules.
Feel free to ask any question or concerns.

1. Absolutely NO smoking cigarettes or cigars inside the apartment, including no smoking in the front or back yards (patio), back porch or any place that is part of the property. Please go outside of the property. There will be a charge from the security deposit for each time this rule is violated or broken.

2. 420 Friendly starting on January 1st, 2020. You can smoke in the back yard (patio) or back porch. Don‚Äôt smoke inside of the apartment or bedrooms.

3. Absolutely NO weapons are allowed inside of the property and NO illegal drugs inside of the property. 

4.	Please make sure that the rooms and/or the property is left in the same condition as when you arrived. 

5.	No street shoes in the house, please bring your slippers. You can leave your street shoes in the shoe rack located in the 2nd floor in front of the apartment door. 

6.  No reimbursements will be made on one or more nights reservations once the check in has been completed. 

7. This apartment can host a maximum of 5 guests. Please make sure to make your booking with the total of guests that you are coming and please you need to register your guest in your reservation. 
* If you exceed the number of guests allowed, you would be violating this rule, I will charge a fine of $150 of your security deposit for violating each time this rule plus $50 of each night for additional guest(s) stayed in the property.

8.	When you come in or out of the property, please make sure to lock the main door street. Please don‚Äôt leave the main door street or apartment door without locking. 

9.	No visitors are allowed, if you plan to get visited for a special occasion (your birthday celebration, etc.) by a friend or family, please let me know in advance. I will charge a fine of $150 of your security deposit for violating this rule, plus any damages done.

10.	Please don‚Äôt throw away garbage in the YARDS (front or back yards) such as bottles, cigarette butts, bottle caps, etc. 

11.	Periodically, the guest(s) is responsible to clean the full bathroom, kitchen and the other areas (rooms) of the apartment. 
The host is responsible to vacuum carpets and rugs including the bedrooms.
* We can charge an extra clean fee to clean bathroom and kitchen for your convenience. Please let me know in advance.
* If the guest fails to clean periodically, is broken an important safety code and the host will charge a fine of $150 of your security deposit plus the cost of each cleaning (depending the size of the issue)

12. Clean up after yourself. Please do not leave food out and/or trash around the apartment, on the floor, on the carpets or in the room(s), or in the bedrooms (Pests prevention).

13.	Please make sure after you are done cooking/heating your food that the all GAS PILOTS ARE OFF.

14.	Please do not leave air conditioning or ceiling fan ON when you leave the room / apartment. During wintertime, you can schedule the heater thermostat for your convenience depending of your schedule of study and/or work. When nobody is at the house, leave/program the heater ON at 59 or 60 degrees, to prevent pipes from freezing.

15.	Please be mindful with the use of energy: electricity, gas, heater, etc. Please turn OFF lights if you're not in the apartment, rooms or bedrooms. If you are going to sleep, please make sure to turn off the lights behind you. 

16.	You are free to come and go at any time, but please be considerate at late hours (don‚Äôt make any noises). If you come back at late hours or need to go outside at early hours, please be mindful.

17.	Quiet time during sleeping hours.

18.	Please respect the neighbors limiting loud noise after 10:00 pm (weekdays) or after 1:00 am (weekends: Fridays & Saturdays)

19.	If something is damaged, spills, or any broken things, or if there are any problems, no matter how small, please contact me or the co-host immediately. Additional contact info will be provided. I charge the security deposit for violating this rule.

20. Please RECYCLE your trash. 
* Dispose of all EMPTY bottles, glass jars or plastic, metal (cans) cartons or containers in a separate bag and place them IN the BLUE RECYCLING BIN located in the ALLEY. 
* The other garbage goes into the SILVER garbage can located in the kitchen, when you want to change the garbage bags, you will find black garbage bags (kitchen garbage bags) and white garbage bags (bathroom garbage bags) under the sink of the kitchen, please tie a knot the full trash bag and then throw it in the BLACK GARBAGE BIN located in the ALLEY.
* Please don‚Äôt leave at any time any kind of garbage, recycle or garbage bags on the porch. 

21. Please do not leave windows and blinds wide open when leaving the room / apartment 

22. BACK YARD: If you are going to use the back yard (shared area) for a sunbath or relax, or for a breakfast, lunch or dinner or use the grill for a BBQ, enjoy it, and please make sure to clean after yourself and recycle your trash.

23. Please Before you leave (check out), wash your dishes, leave the bed sheets on the bed and hang all used (wet) towels on the pole of the shower or on the towel rack located in the kitchen. We will provide more information if is necessary.

Note: 
A. You as a guest(s) must provide a valid State ID or Driver License or Passport during your check in if the host think is necessary.
B. When you check in, you'll receive a copy of our House Manual and House Rules to facilitate and guide you.
