access:
You will Enjoy our gorgeous apartment using our comfortable living room, we call it the Relaxing room with a beautiful carpet and many pillows and a few chairs to relax, listen to quiet and relaxing music, do yoga, meditation, or receiving a Relaxing Therapeutic Massage,  or read a book while feeling the breeze of our ceiling fan, I have decorated this space with plants and some international decorations of our trips.

The dining room is spacious with a comfortable table, light decorated with our trip souvenirs. You can also enjoy your meals around the table or in the kitchen table as you want.
>> There is a smart HD TV with Netflix & YouTube access & Blue-ray DVD player in the dining room area where you can enjoy our local channels, movies, TV shows, etc.

You can enjoy the bathroom where we can provide clean towels, other amenities such as soap, shampoo, conditioner, hand cream, body lotion and toiletries.

We have a good equipped kitchen with a stove, stove extractor, refrigerator with ice machine, cabinets, microwave, conventional oven, toaster, blender, pantry to store your food products, etc.
>> We can provide coffee, tea, powder milk, white sugar & coffee filters 
>> Enjoy cooking your own breakfast, lunch or dinner where we provide kitchen utensils to facilitate the time for your cooking. We can provide salt & pepper, some condiments and oil. You can place your fresh produces in the refrigerator. 
‚Ä¢ You can refresh yourself with ice cubes from our ice maker machine and cool water that is part of the fridge; you can also prepare your own smoothies and beverages. 

Wi-fi 24/7.

Shared Areas:
> During your stay you can use our beautiful & shared back yard of the house and our new patio, you can use this yard by using our umbrellas, a yard chair or using your own towel to relax, for sunbathing or read a book, you can also have a peaceful experience enjoying our tons of plants and flowers, during the spring/summer days beautiful birds singing around the yard, you can also use the grill outside. Remember to clean up after yourself. If you want to enjoy the show of lighting bugs you have to go outside after the sunset!

> We have a shared laundry in the lower floor of the building where you can have access to wash and dry your clothes, so guest like you would not have to go elsewhere to do laundry.

> The gym is located 4 blocks away from the house. If you are interested take advantage of their FREE 7 Days guest pass.

> If you have a car, free parking is allowed around the house. On my block is Residential Parking: if you want to park on my block you need a permit parking pass, please ask me for more information about the daily or permanent parking pass.
description:
Our Beautiful Blue Sky Apartment is located in a SAFE and QUIET neighborhood and in the middle of our multicultural city. 24/7 public transportation, the bus stop is STEPS AWAY from the house. 
After an exciting day you can always come back home to relax. Our place is good for couples, families and groups. 
420 Friendly starting on January 1st, 2020.

Our home is your home: we are sharing our beautiful and relaxing Apartment by AIRBNB and we want to give you the best, simple and unique at same time.

You can enjoy our Beautiful Blue Sky Apartment nicely decorated with multicultural details of our trips, with cozy bedrooms available for our guests in a safe and quiet neighborhood located in the middle of a very cultural northwest side of the city equipped with a beautiful back yard & comfortable climate. As a guest or student - You will have access to 24-hour public transportation to go everywhere in our Cosmopolitan City; the 77 CTA bus stop is steps away from the house (you can transfer to other city buses, city train, METRA, Amtrak, Airports, etc.) 

The apartment is located in the 2nd floor. You can have 3 comfy and private bedrooms with 3 Queen size beds and 1 twin size bed, we can provide a queen size air mattress for your convenience, comfortable pillows and linens, 3 nightstand, 3 dressers, enough closets space. Your bedrooms also have windows with curtains and blinds. 

We have air conditioners that we use during hot days, one of them is in the living room that has the power to cool the whole apartment; each bedroom has AC. There are ceiling fans in the living room and bedrooms to help to cool your rooms faster. 
The sheets and blankets are top notch and comfortable, and during cold time we can provide thermal blankets.

During the wintertime we have a heater radiator that keeps the rooms and the whole apartment in a comfortable temperature to keep you warm and cozy. You can schedule the heater thermostat for your convenience depending of your schedule of study and/or work. Also we provide a space electric heater for your convenience.

There is a HD TV & a Blue-ray DVD player with Netflix and YouTube access in the dining room area where you can enjoy our local channels, movies, TV shows, etc.

>> We have a shared laundry in the lower floor of the building where you can have access to wash and dry your clothes, so guest like you would not have to go elsewhere to do laundry.

> The gym is located a walking distance (4 blocks away from the house). If you are interested take advantage of their FREE 7 Days guest pass.

After an exciting day in the city you can always come to a very comfortable home. To relax in the backyard, take a nap, nice warm shower, read a book or laid back and listen to music, so you can start another exciting new day.

Exclusive Service:
Most of the time when we travel, we‚Äôre tired or stress. Would it be nice to receive a relaxing massage? To answer the question, yes, we offer (if interested) upon arrival, a 5 minutes chair massage with no cost. Also, if interested in a more Relaxing Therapeutic table massage, we can offer 45 to 60 minutes massage with an additional cost in an aroma therapy ambiance and/or relaxing music. 
At the end of the relaxing massage, you may also enjoy a cup of organic green or red tea. 
The therapist focuses on deep tissue, some sports massage and trigger points. By receiving a Relaxing Therapeutic Massage you‚Äôre going to feel energized, relaxed, rejuvenated so you can enjoy your visit here in the Windy City and in our home.

You will Enjoy our gorgeous apartment using our comfortable living room, we call it the Relaxing room with a beautiful carpet and many pillows and a few chairs to relax, listen to quiet and relaxing music, do yoga, meditation, or receiving a Relaxing Therapeutic Massage,  or read a book while feeling the breeze of our ceiling fan, I have decorated this space with plants and some international decorations of our trips.

The dining room is spacious with a comfortable table, light decorated with our trip souvenirs. You can also enjoy your meals around the table or in the kitchen table as you want.
>> There is a smart HD TV with Netflix & YouTube access & Blue-ray DVD player in the dining room area where you can enjoy our local channels, movies, TV shows, etc.

You can enjoy the bathroom where we can provide clean towels, other amenities such as soap, shampoo, conditioner, hand cream, body lotion and toiletries.

We have a good equipped kitchen with a stove, stove extractor, refrigerator with ice machine, cabinets, microwave, conventional oven, toaster, blender, pantry to store your food products, etc.
>> We can provide coffee, tea, powder milk, white sugar & coffee filters 
>> Enjoy cooking your own breakfast, lunch or dinner where we provide kitchen utensils to facilitate the time for your cooking. We can provide salt & pepper, some condiments and oil. You can place your fresh produces in the refrigerator. 
‚Ä¢ You can refresh yourself with ice cubes from our ice maker machine and cool water that is part of the fridge; you can also prepare your own smoothies and beverages. 

Wi-fi 24/7.

Shared Areas:
> During your stay you can use our beautiful & shared back yard of the house and our new patio, you can use this yard by using our umbrellas, a yard chair or using your own towel to relax, for sunbathing or read a book, you can also have a peaceful experience enjoying our tons of plants and flowers, during the spring/summer days beautiful birds singing around the yard, you can also use the grill outside. Remember to clean up after yourself. If you want to enjoy the show of lighting bugs you have to go outside after the sunset!

> We have a shared laundry in the lower floor of the building where you can have access to wash and dry your clothes, so guest like you would not have to go elsewhere to do laundry.

> The gym is located 4 blocks away from the house. If you are interested take advantage of their FREE 7 Days guest pass.

> If you have a car, free parking is allowed around the house. On my block is Residential Parking: if you want to park on my block you need a permit parking pass, please ask me for more information about the daily or permanent parking pass.

We live in the property but in another private unit, so we will be available to answer any questions or help with any information that you may need, give restaurant recommendations, etc. However, we respect your privacy and open to any interaction if you want.
We will try our best to help you feel comfortable at all time.

‚Ä¢ We expect that our guest(s) enjoy their stay in our home, also we expect that our guest(s) have a plan to visit our city or a schedule of regular work or studies, we expect that our guest(s) not stay COOPED in the house all the time.

Beautiful, safe and quiet neighborhood located in the middle of a very cultural northwest side of the city.  As a guest or student, you will have access to 24-hour public transportation to go everywhere in our Cosmopolitan City; the 77 CTA bus stop is steps away from the house (you can transfer to other city buses, city train, METRA, Amtrak, Airports, etc.)

- A great variety of stores where you can find products, fresh and international produces, in walking distance and around the neighborhood: Bristol Deli, Tony‚Äôs fines food, Walgreens, Walmart, Jewel-Osco, Target, etc.

- Many restaurants close to the house in walking distance such as Mexican, Puerto Rican, Polish, Italian, Greek, Middle Eastern, Asian and American diners. 

- Two huge parks with an outdoor swimming pools and indoor in one of the parks, public library, gym (4 blocks from the house), one of the city colleges of Chicago, the mall, post office, banks, auto services, Marshalls, Home depot, CVS, Big Lots,  etc. and 30 minutes to the lake in public transportation, 20 minutes in car and 35 minutes to downtown in public transportation, 25 by car (depending the hours of the traffic)

- There is a Hospital in the area with an emergency room for your convenience. (Community First Medical Center ‚Äì 7 minutes away driving from the house)

We have very nice, friendly and multicultural neighbors on the block and you can take a walk around other neighborhoods and you can find gentle people and enjoy the view of different and beautiful houses and its beautiful gardens with beautiful flowers, trees and different seasonal decorations and festivities decorations.

The gym is located 4 blocks away from the house. If you are interested, take advantage of their FREE 7 Days guest pass.

Chicago is a huge city to explore if you want your stay to be memorable and exciting here are some things to do: easy access to see a CUBS or SOX game, visit the different diverse neighborhoods for the street festivals, see our amazing architecture in downtown, ride the double Decker bus, visit ALL of our beautiful amazing museums, Millennium park which offers free concerts, the Art institute, take a stroll on the magnificent Michigan mile, Navy Pier, plays and operas, also take a walk, run, biking or sunbathe in our beautiful beaches in front of the blue lake Michigan.

Want to continue the fun at night? There are lots of things to do such as dance clubs, lounges, bars, and movie theaters.

We can provide visitors guides and city maps for free to explore the city.
We suggest buying a VENTRA (Public transportation) CARD PASS in the Airport or at any CTA Line station, or at any Walgreens store for a weekend or for a whole week or month depending of your days of stay. Also, we suggest buying a CITY-PASS if you want to do a TOUR in Downtown and save money during your enjoyable stay to have access to the most popular and amazing places in the city for a reasonable price.

After an exciting day in the city you can always come to a very comfortable home. To relax in the backyard, take a nap, nice warm shower, read book or laid back and listen to music, so you can start another exciting new day.

- The Blue-Sky Apartment is located in the second floor of our property. 

- We will be very happy to receive you in our comfortable apartment, please when you apply for our place, share a little about yourself, and if you come with another guest we would like to know about him/her as well, what brings you to visit Chicago? What will be your plans during your stay? And why or what made you chose our place? We are going to thank you. 

- Please, we would like to see a clear picture of you on your AIRBNB profile, so we can quickly know to identify you when you come to check into my home. Thank You.

- No street shoes in the house, please bring your slippers. You can leave your street shoes in the shoe rack located in the 2nd floor in front of the apartment door. 

- Always lock the doors when you leave or entering the house using the key that we provided you. 

- If you have planned to do your check out very early in the morning, no problem just please let me know in advance to give you special guides to leave the keys.

- Please read the signs with additional information (friendly reminders) that are placed in different areas of the house (rooms, doors, cabinets, bathroom, etc.) we encourage you to follow the indications. 

- You will have access to a 24 hours public transportation (77 CTA Bus) the bus stop is steps away from the house

- The gym is located 4 blocks away from the house. If you are interested, take advantage of their FREE 7 Days guest pass.
house_rules:
Due to past circumstances with some guests, we have had to implement these new house rules. Please read carefully all the house rules.
Feel free to ask any question or concerns.

1. Absolutely NO smoking cigarettes or cigars inside the apartment, including no smoking in the front or back yards (patio), back porch or any place that is part of the property. Please go outside of the property. There will be a charge from the security deposit for each time this rule is violated or broken.

2. 420 Friendly starting on January 1st, 2020. You can smoke in the back yard (patio) or back porch. Don‚Äôt smoke inside of the apartment or bedrooms.

3. Absolutely NO weapons are allowed inside of the property and NO illegal drugs inside of the property. 

4.	Please make sure that the rooms and/or the property is left in the same condition as when you arrived. 

5.	No street shoes in the house, please bring your slippers. You can leave your street shoes in the shoe rack located in the 2nd floor in front of the apartment door. 

6.  No reimbursements will be made on one or more nights reservations once the check in has been completed. 

7. This apartment can host a maximum of 5 guests. Please make sure to make your booking with the total of guests that you are coming and please you need to register your guest in your reservation. 
* If you exceed the number of guests allowed, you would be violating this rule, I will charge a fine of $150 of your security deposit for violating each time this rule plus $50 of each night for additional guest(s) stayed in the property.

8.	When you come in or out of the property, please make sure to lock the main door street. Please don‚Äôt leave the main door street or apartment door without locking. 

9.	No visitors are allowed, if you plan to get visited for a special occasion (your birthday celebration, etc.) by a friend or family, please let me know in advance. I will charge a fine of $150 of your security deposit for violating this rule, plus any damages done.

10.	Please don‚Äôt throw away garbage in the YARDS (front or back yards) such as bottles, cigarette butts, bottle caps, etc. 

11.	Periodically, the guest(s) is responsible to clean the full bathroom, kitchen and the other areas (rooms) of the apartment. 
The host is responsible to vacuum carpets and rugs including the bedrooms.
* We can charge an extra clean fee to clean bathroom and kitchen for your convenience. Please let me know in advance.
* If the guest fails to clean periodically, is broken an important safety code and the host will charge a fine of $150 of your security deposit plus the cost of each cleaning (depending the size of the issue)

12. Clean up after yourself. Please do not leave food out and/or trash around the apartment, on the floor, on the carpets or in the room(s), or in the bedrooms (Pests prevention).

13.	Please make sure after you are done cooking/heating your food that the all GAS PILOTS ARE OFF.

14.	Please do not leave air conditioning or ceiling fan ON when you leave the room / apartment. During wintertime, you can schedule the heater thermostat for your convenience depending of your schedule of study and/or work. When nobody is at the house, leave/program the heater ON at 59 or 60 degrees, to prevent pipes from freezing.

15.	Please be mindful with the use of energy: electricity, gas, heater, etc. Please turn OFF lights if you're not in the apartment, rooms or bedrooms. If you are going to sleep, please make sure to turn off the lights behind you. 

16.	You are free to come and go at any time, but please be considerate at late hours (don‚Äôt make any noises). If you come back at late hours or need to go outside at early hours, please be mindful.

17.	Quiet time during sleeping hours.

18.	Please respect the neighbors limiting loud noise after 10:00 pm (weekdays) or after 1:00 am (weekends: Fridays & Saturdays)

19.	If something is damaged, spills, or any broken things, or if there are any problems, no matter how small, please contact me or the co-host immediately. Additional contact info will be provided. I charge the security deposit for violating this rule.

20. Please RECYCLE your trash. 
* Dispose of all EMPTY bottles, glass jars or plastic, metal (cans) cartons or containers in a separate bag and place them IN the BLUE RECYCLING BIN located in the ALLEY. 
* The other garbage goes into the SILVER garbage can located in the kitchen, when you want to change the garbage bags, you will find black garbage bags (kitchen garbage bags) and white garbage bags (bathroom garbage bags) under the sink of the kitchen, please tie a knot the full trash bag and then throw it in the BLACK GARBAGE BIN located in the ALLEY.
* Please don‚Äôt leave at any time any kind of garbage, recycle or garbage bags on the porch. 

21. Please do not leave windows and blinds wide open when leaving the room / apartment 

22. BACK YARD: If you are going to use the back yard (shared area) for a sunbath or relax, or for a breakfast, lunch or dinner or use the grill for a BBQ, enjoy it, and please make sure to clean after yourself and recycle your trash.

23. Please Before you leave (check out), wash your dishes, leave the bed sheets on the bed and hang all used (wet) towels on the pole of the shower or on the towel rack located in the kitchen. We will provide more information if is necessary.

Note: 
A. You as a guest(s) must provide a valid State ID or Driver License or Passport during your check in if the host think is necessary.
B. When you check in, you'll receive a copy of our House Manual and House Rules to facilitate and guide you.

description:
Complete your Chicago experience by staying in this stunning two floor apartment. Conveniently situated in South Loop, this luxurious space was designed to make you feel at home. Guests will also have access to the building's amenities. Whether traveling solo, with friends, or with family, see the best of art, culture, and food that Chicago has to offer and have an unforgettable stay at this Domio.

The entry level features a living room and large kitchen. The second floor features three bedrooms, each with a queen size bed for comfort. There is a sofa bed and air mattress for added comfort.

Guests have access to the buildings state of the art amenities including:
Fitness Center
Pool
Jacuzzi
Skyview Lounge
Rooftap Terrace
Billiards Lounge
Indoor Basketball Court
Racquetball Court
Yoga Studio
HD Golf Simulator
Putting Green

There‚Äôs no need for us to get in your way of having a good time. If you need anything though - questions, recommendations, or just want to chat - our Domio delighters are always one phone call away!

Chicago Registration Number: Pending

Please note that we do not allow bookings from residents of Chicago and surrounding areas.

Large and spacious two bedroom, 1.5 bath located right off Sheridan, and a block away from the lake. 20 minutes ride downtown Chicago!

Two queen sized bed, a fully equipped kitchen, 1 full bath, and an extra restroom in the master bedroom.A perfect spot to relax after a hard day touring or attending local functions.
Located on a fine line, 10mins to the Loyola University and Northwestern; 20mins to downtown, and two blocks away from the lake!
Your comfort is important to me, so make sure you contact me for anything you need!

access: Ever dreamed about jetting off to your own Chicago apartment? Well, now‚Äôs your chance to bring that fantasy to life. During your stay, the whole apartment is yours and only yours.
description:
Spend your holiday in our chic and airy two-bedroom enclave located in the trendy town of Wicker Park. Specially designed to fulfill the needs of every modern traveler, our spacious unit delivers home-style comfort with hotel-level service. And with our charming community‚Äôs tourist-friendly atmosphere, exploring each and nook and cranny is definitely an easy feat.

Our two-bedroom suite is carefully curated to ensure that your stay in town will not be compromised, starting with our strategic layout that comfortably accommodates a party of up to eight people. With your pleasure and convenience in mind, we equipped the unit with state-of-the-art furniture, temperature control system, and high speed internet. A 55-inch flat screen smart TV and a full and spacious kitchen are also available to make you feel at home. For your safety, a CCTV system is installed in the building perimeter.

Ever dreamed about jetting off to your own Chicago apartment? Well, now‚Äôs your chance to bring that fantasy to life. During your stay, the whole apartment is yours and only yours.

We‚Äôre all about giving you plenty of privacy and personal space, so we‚Äôll be available by phone (call or text) during your stay.

Whatever brings you to town, Wicker Park‚Äôs gastronomic delights must not be missed after a day of exploring the city‚Äôs contemporary art galleries. Known for its myriad of flavors, the town features a number of bistros that have influenced Michelin-starred restaurants all over the country. From Asian flavors (Urbanbelly, En Hakkore, and Furious Spoon), Southern comfort food (Dove‚Äôs Luncheonette and The Delta), Mexican (Antique Taco and Big Star) to American favorites (Small Cheval, Wynwood, and Tricycle Chicago), the town‚Äôs bustling food scene will whatever you‚Äôre craving covered.

We encourage you to leave your cars at home and explore the town on foot. Also, concierge service is available from 9:00AM-10:00PM to assist you should you have any questions or concerns during your stay.

-Bath towels are provided per number of guest not per number of stay
-Washcloths are not provided during your stay. You may send me a message though if you need them and I'll try my best to accommodate your request.
-We have duvet covers on our beddings  (no top sheets).
-A Security Deposit may be required on some bookings. 
-If there's an issue during your stay, please report it real time so we can address it right away.

additional_house_rules:
1.	Absolutely NO smoking inside the apartment, including no smoking on the yards (patio), back porch or any place that is part of the property. Please go outside of the property. I charge the security deposit for violating this rule.

2.	Please make sure that the room and/or the property is left in the same condition as when you arrived. 

3.	No street shoes in the house, please bring your slippers. You can leave your street shoes in the hallway in front of the apartment door. 

4. No reimbursements will be made on two or more nights reservations once the check in has been completed

5.	When you come in or out of the property, please make sure to lock the main door street. Please don‚Äôt leave the main door street or apartment door without lock. 

6.	No visitors are allowed, if you plan to get visited for a special occasion by a friend or family, please letting me know in advance. I charge the security deposit for violating this rule.

7.	Please don‚Äôt throw away garbage in the YARDS (front or back yards) such as bottles, cigarette butts, bottle caps, etc. 

8.	Clean up after yourself. Do not leave dirty dishes in the sink. Do not leave food out and/or trash around the apartment, on the floor or in the room(s). 

9.	If you are going to cook, enjoy your meal, we ask that you please clean-up after yourself. Please make sure after you are done cooking/heating your food that the all GAS PILOTS ARE OFF.

10.	Please do not leave air conditioning or heater or ceiling fan ON when you leave the room / apartment.

11.	Please turn OFF lights if you're not in the room or bedroom. If you are going to sleep, please make sure to turn off all lights that you turned on behind you.

12.	Please Do not leave clothes laying around in the common areas, such as bathroom, living room, etc.

13.	Please DO NOT eat or bring any type of food in the bedrooms, you can use the dining table to enjoy your food. 

14.	You are free to come and go in anytime, but please be considerate at late hours (don‚Äôt make any noises)

15.	Quiet time during sleeping hours.

16.	Please respect the neighbors limiting loud noise after 10pm (weekdays) or after 1am (weekends: Fridays & Saturdays)

17.	If something is damaged, spills, or any broken things, or if there are any problems, no matter how small, please contact me or any other family member immediately. Contact info will be provided. I charge the security deposit for violating this rule.

18.	Please recycle your trash. Dispose of all EMPTY bottles, glass jars or plastic, metal (cans) cartons or containers in a separate bag and place them on the side of the kitchen garbage can. The other garbage goes into the SILVER garbage can located in the kitchen.

19.	Please do not leave windows and blinds wide open when leaving the room / apartment 

20.	BACK YARD: If you are going to use the back yard (shared area) for a sunbath or relax, or for a breakfast, lunch or dinner or use the grill for a BBQ, enjoy it, and please make sure to clean after yourself and recycle your trash.

21.	Please Before you leave (check out), wash your dishes, leave the bed sheets on the bed and hung all used (wet) towels on the pole of the shower.

Note: 
A. You as a guest(s) must provide a valid State ID or Driver License or Passport during your check in if the host think is necessary.
B. When you check in, you'll receive a copy of our House Manual and House Rules to facilitate and guide you.

access:
Enjoy our apartment using the Living room, is called the Motivational Living Room, You can enjoy this shared ambiance using our very comfortable sofa and chairs to relax, listen to music or read a book while feeling the breeze of our ceiling fan, I have decorated this space with plants and some international decorations of our trips.
Do You love to watch movies and experience the special effects and sounds? No problem, we have in our living room on the Fireplace a 52" HDTV with surround sound system, Smart Hub with Netflix, Youtube to watch programs, movies, etc. We have a blue ray dvd player as well.

The shared dining room is spacious with a comfortable table for four people, light decorated with our trip souvenirs. You can also enjoy your meals around the table or on the kitchen table as you want.
You can use our shared bathroom where we can provide clean towels, other amenities such as soap, shampoo, hand cream, body lotion and toiletries. 

We have a good kitchen with a stove, stove extractor, refrigerator, cabinets, microwave, small conventional oven, toaster, blender, pantry to store your food products, etc.

>>>Complimentary Light Breakfast: 
We can offer a complimentary light breakfast at our discretion, that‚Äôs included: coffee, tea, white sugar, powder milk & coffee filters.
<<< All other meals will incur an additional cost. Meals and any additional payment should be arranged directly with me.
>>> Enjoy cooking your own breakfast, lunch or dinner where we can provide kitchen utensils to facilitate the time for your cooking. We can provide salt & pepper, some condiments, oil and a specific space for your fresh produces in the refrigerator. 
‚Ä¢ You can refresh yourself with ice cubes from our ice maker machine and cool water that is part of the fridge; you can also prepare your own smoothies and beverages. 

‚Ä¢ Please you have to clean everything that you used and leave everything as it was, please whatever you dirty clean it. You can enjoy your meals in two places: in the kitchen table or in the dining room.

During your stay you can use the beautiful back yard of the house with a brick patio, you can use this yard by using our umbrellas, a yard chair or using your own towel to relax, for sunbathing or read a book, you can also have a peaceful experience enjoying our tons of plants and flowers, during the day beautiful birds singing around the yard, you can also use the grill outside. Remember to clean up after yourself. If you want to enjoy the show of lighting bugs you have to go outside after the sunset!

Wi-fi 24/7

PARKING:
‚Ä¢ If you have a car, free parking is allowed a few steps away from the house and/or around my block. 
‚Ä¢ On my block is Residential Parking. You need a permit parking passes. if you want to purchase the permit parking passes please let me know in advance so I can hold the passes for you. 
Feel free to ask any question.
description:
Beautiful house in a SAFE and QUIET neighborhood, located in the middle of our cultural city. 24h/7d public transportation, the bus stop is STEPS AWAY from the house. After an exciting/busy day you can always come back home to relax.
We have hosted students & interns that went to DePaul, KENDALL, Inst. Medical Educ, IL Inst. of Art, Loyola, Argosy, Roosevelt, East-West, UIC, R. Morris, U. Of Illinois, Columbia, NEIU, Dominican, AIME, etc. Business, Companies, Clinics & Hospitals

Our home is your home: we are sharing our beautiful and relaxing home by AIRBNB and we want to give you the best, simple and unique at same time.

You can enjoy our Beautiful red brick house in a safe and quiet neighborhood located in the middle of a very cultural northwest side of the city equipped with a beautiful back yard & comfortable climate. As a guest or student you will have access to 24 hour public transportation (buses, city train and METRA, UBER) a great variety of stores where you can find products, fresh produce and internationally, restaurants such as Mexican Puerto Rican, Peruvian, polish, Italian, Greek, middle eastern, Asian and American diners. 
- 2 huge parks with an outdoor swimming pools and indoor in one of the parks, public library, gym, one of the city colleges of Chicago, the mall, post office, 30 minutes to the lake in public transportation and 20 minutes in car, 30 to 50 minutes to downtown in public transportation (depends on traffic) and 25 by car (depends on traffic).

Chicago is a huge city to explore if you want your stay to be memorable and exciting here are some things to do: easy access to see a CUBS or SOX game, visit the different diverse neighborhoods for the street festivals, see our amazing architecture in downtown, ride the double Decker bus, visit ALL of our beautiful amazing museums, Millennium park which offers free concerts, the Art institute, take a stroll on the magnificent Michigan mile, Navy Pier, plays and operas, also take a walk, run, biking or sunbathe in our beautiful beaches in front of the blue lake Michigan.

Want to continue the fun at night? There are lots of things to do such as dance clubs, lounges, bars, and movie theaters.

After an exciting day in the city you can always come to a very comfortable home. To relax in the backyard, take a nap, nice warm shower, read book or laid back and listen to music, so you can start another exciting new day.

YOUR BEDROOM: 
You can have a clean and private bedroom with a Queen size bed and comfortable pillows and the bed sheets and blankets are top notch and comfortable, and during cold time we can provide thermal topnotch blankets; a night stand, a dresser, enough closet space, and if you are student we can provide a computer table. Your bedroom also has a window with curtains.
We have air conditioners that we use during hot days, one of them is located in the living room that have the power to cool the whole apartment, the other one is in your bedroom. The room has also a ceiling fan so during the summer or warm days will help to cool your room more faster.
During the winter time we have a heater radiator that keeps the room and the whole apartment in a comfortable temperature to keep you warm and cozy.

IMPORTANT:
‚Ä¢ There is a queen size bed in the bedroom for one or two guests.
. But If you are 2 (two) guests and wants to use the additional bed, (twin size bed) please you need to let me know in advance prior to make your booking or at less 3 to 5 days prior your check in, so we can place the second bed into the bedroom. (bed sheets, blankets, pillows, etc.)
. If you don‚Äôt letting me know at time, I will charge you a fee of $50 for that. Thank you!

>> You can have access to our laundry, so guest like you would not have to go elsewhere to do laundry.

Exclusive Service: 
Most of the time when we travel we‚Äôre tired or stress. Would it be nice to receive a relaxing massage? To answer the question, yes, we offer (if interested) upon arrival, a 5 minutes chair massage with no cost. Also if interested in a more Relaxing Therapeutic table massage, we can offer 45 to 60 minutes massage with an additional cost in an aroma therapy ambiance and/or relaxing music. At the end of the relaxing massage, you may also enjoy a cup of organic green or red tea. The therapist focuses on deep tissue, some sports massage and trigger points. By receiving a Relaxing Therapeutic Massage you‚Äôre going to feel energized, relaxed, rejuvenated so you can enjoy your visit here in the Windy City and in our home.

Enjoy our apartment using the Living room, is called the Motivational Living Room, You can enjoy this shared ambiance using our very comfortable sofa and chairs to relax, listen to music or read a book while feeling the breeze of our ceiling fan, I have decorated this space with plants and some international decorations of our trips.
Do You love to watch movies and experience the special effects and sounds? No problem, we have in our living room on the Fireplace a 52" HDTV with surround sound system, Smart Hub with Netflix, Youtube to watch programs, movies, etc. We have a blue ray dvd player as well.

The shared dining room is spacious with a comfortable table for four people, light decorated with our trip souvenirs. You can also enjoy your meals around the table or on the kitchen table as you want.
You can use our shared bathroom where we can provide clean towels, other amenities such as soap, shampoo, hand cream, body lotion and toiletries. 

We have a good kitchen with a stove, stove extractor, refrigerator, cabinets, microwave, small conventional oven, toaster, blender, pantry to store your food products, etc.

>>>Complimentary Light Breakfast: 
We can offer a complimentary light breakfast at our discretion, that‚Äôs included: coffee, tea, white sugar, powder milk & coffee filters.
<<< All other meals will incur an additional cost. Meals and any additional payment should be arranged directly with me.
>>> Enjoy cooking your own breakfast, lunch or dinner where we can provide kitchen utensils to facilitate the time for your cooking. We can provide salt & pepper, some condiments, oil and a specific space for your fresh produces in the refrigerator. 
‚Ä¢ You can refresh yourself with ice cubes from our ice maker machine and cool water that is part of the fridge; you can also prepare your own smoothies and beverages. 

‚Ä¢ Please you have to clean everything that you used and leave everything as it was, please whatever you dirty clean it. You can enjoy your meals in two places: in the kitchen table or in the dining room.

During your stay you can use the beautiful back yard of the house with a brick patio, you can use this yard by using our umbrellas, a yard chair or using your own towel to relax, for sunbathing or read a book, you can also have a peaceful experience enjoying our tons of plants and flowers, during the day beautiful birds singing around the yard, you can also use the grill outside. Remember to clean up after yourself. If you want to enjoy the show of lighting bugs you have to go outside after the sunset!

Wi-fi 24/7

PARKING:
‚Ä¢ If you have a car, free parking is allowed a few steps away from the house and/or around my block. 
‚Ä¢ On my block is Residential Parking. You need a permit parking passes. if you want to purchase the permit parking passes please let me know in advance so I can hold the passes for you. 
Feel free to ask any question.

‚Ä¢ We live in the property so we will definitely be available to meet you, help you during your check in, answer any questions or help with any information that you may need, give restaurant recommendations, or just have a great conversation in any of our comfortable areas if you want!
I will try my best to help you feel comfortable at all the time.
‚Ä¢ We expect that our guest(s) enjoy their stay in our home, also we expect that our guest(s) have a plan to visit our city or a schedule of regular work or studies, we expect that our guest(s) not stay COOPED in the house.

Beautiful 2 flat brick house in a safe and quiet neighborhood located in the middle of a very cultural northwest side of the city. As a guest or student you will have access to 24 hour public transportation (busses, city train and METRA, UBER) a great variety of stores where you can find products, fresh produce and internationally, restaurants such as Mexican Puerto Rican, Peruvian, polish, Italian, Greek, middle eastern, Asian and American diners. 2 huge parks with an outdoor swimming pools and indoor in one of the parks, public library, gym, one of the city colleges of Chicago, the mall, post office, and 30 minutes to the lake in public transportation, 20 minutes in car and 40 minutes to downtown in public transportation, 30 by car. 

We have very nice, friendly and multicultural neighbors on the block and you can take a walk around other neighborhoods and you can find gentle people and seeing beautiful houses and its yards with beautiful flowers, trees and plants.

Chicago is a huge city to explore if you want your stay to be memorable and exciting here are some things to do: easy access to see a CUBS or SOX game, visit the different diverse neighborhoods for the street festivals, see our amazing architecture in downtown, ride the double Decker bus, visit ALL of our beautiful amazing museums, Millennium park which offers free concerts, the Art institute, take a stroll on the magnificent Michigan mile, Navy Pier, plays and operas, also take a walk, run, biking or sunbathe in our beautiful beaches in front of the blue lake Michigan.

Want to continue the fun at night? There are lots of things to do such as dance clubs, lounges, bars, and movie theaters.
After an exciting day in the city you can always come to a very comfortable home. To relax in the backyard, take a nap, nice warm shower, read book or laid back and listen to music, so you can start another exciting new day.

We can provide visitors guides and city maps for free to explore the city. 
We suggest to buy a VENTRA (Public transportation) card in the Airport or at any CTA Line station, for a weekend or for a whole week depending of your days of stay. Also we suggest to buy a CITY-PASS if you want to do a TOUR in Downtown and save money during your enjoyable stay to have access to the most popular and amazing places in the city for a reasonable price.

- We will be very happy to receive you in our comfortable home, please when you apply for a room, share a little about yourself, and if you come with another guest we would like to know about him/her as well, what brings you to visit Chicago? And why or what made you chose my place? We are going to thank you.

- No street shoes inside the apartment, please bring your slippers.

- Quiet time after 10pm to 9:00 am specially weekdays. Please no sounds or noises, you can use your headphones between these hours to listen to your music. Quiet time during the Weekends after 12 midnight or 1am to 10am is fine. 
- During the sleeping time, please be considerate with others by putting the sound notification of your phone (text messages, emails, and any notifications) in silence or in vibrate
- If you plan to wake up early and you need to put an alarm, please turn off the alarm immediately after you wake up, this is for consideration of the other family members and guests that are still sleeping.
- Please be mindful that the common areas are shared, so maintain a clean environment. 
- Always lock the doors when you leave or entering into the house using the key that we provided you. 
- When you are not in your room or bedroom, please be considerate with the use of the energy, TURN OFF lights, fan, air conditioner, etc. 
- When you are going to sleep, please make sure to turn off all lights behind you 
- If you have planned to do your check out very early in the morning, please leave the door of your bedroom open and if we are not available to receive the keys, please put the keys on the bed.
- Please read the signs with additional information (friendly reminders) that are placed in different areas of the house (rooms, doors, cabinets, bathroom, etc.) we encourage you to follow the indications. 
‚Ä¢After your breakfast, please clean the area that you are occupying: kitchen table, dining table, stove, dishes, etc. 
- Use of the kitchen: If you are going to cook, please enjoy your meal, once again clean after yourself, such as ‚Äúpots, pans, utensils, dishes, THE STOVE‚Äù (make sure after you are done cooking/heating your food that the all Gas PILOTS Are off) 

- You will have access to a 24 hours public transportation (77 CTA Bus) the bus stop is steps away from the house
- Access to gym: XSport fitness is located four blocks west from the house (ask for your FREE SEVEN DAYS GUEST PASS)
- Acces to ZIPCARS: car rental
house_rules:
1.	Absolutely NO smoking inside the apartment, including no smoking on the yards (patio), back porch or any place that is part of the property. Please go outside of the property. I charge the security deposit for violating this rule.

2.	Please make sure that the room and/or the property is left in the same condition as when you arrived. 

3.	No street shoes in the house, please bring your slippers. You can leave your street shoes in the hallway in front of the apartment door. 

4. No reimbursements will be made on two or more nights reservations once the check in has been completed

5.	When you come in or out of the property, please make sure to lock the main door street. Please don‚Äôt leave the main door street or apartment door without lock. 

6.	No visitors are allowed, if you plan to get visited for a special occasion by a friend or family, please letting me know in advance. I charge the security deposit for violating this rule.

7.	Please don‚Äôt throw away garbage in the YARDS (front or back yards) such as bottles, cigarette butts, bottle caps, etc. 

8.	Clean up after yourself. Do not leave dirty dishes in the sink. Do not leave food out and/or trash around the apartment, on the floor or in the room(s). 

9.	If you are going to cook, enjoy your meal, we ask that you please clean-up after yourself. Please make sure after you are done cooking/heating your food that the all GAS PILOTS ARE OFF.

10.	Please do not leave air conditioning or heater or ceiling fan ON when you leave the room / apartment.

11.	Please turn OFF lights if you're not in the room or bedroom. If you are going to sleep, please make sure to turn off all lights that you turned on behind you.

12.	Please Do not leave clothes laying around in the common areas, such as bathroom, living room, etc.

13.	Please DO NOT eat or bring any type of food in the bedrooms, you can use the dining table to enjoy your food. 

14.	You are free to come and go in anytime, but please be considerate at late hours (don‚Äôt make any noises)

15.	Quiet time during sleeping hours.

16.	Please respect the neighbors limiting loud noise after 10pm (weekdays) or after 1am (weekends: Fridays & Saturdays)

17.	If something is damaged, spills, or any broken things, or if there are any problems, no matter how small, please contact me or any other family member immediately. Contact info will be provided. I charge the security deposit for violating this rule.

18.	Please recycle your trash. Dispose of all EMPTY bottles, glass jars or plastic, metal (cans) cartons or containers in a separate bag and place them on the side of the kitchen garbage can. The other garbage goes into the SILVER garbage can located in the kitchen.

19.	Please do not leave windows and blinds wide open when leaving the room / apartment 

20.	BACK YARD: If you are going to use the back yard (shared area) for a sunbath or relax, or for a breakfast, lunch or dinner or use the grill for a BBQ, enjoy it, and please make sure to clean after yourself and recycle your trash.

21.	Please Before you leave (check out), wash your dishes, leave the bed sheets on the bed and hung all used (wet) towels on the pole of the shower.

Note: 
A. You as a guest(s) must provide a valid State ID or Driver License or Passport during your check in if the host think is necessary.
B. When you check in, you'll receive a copy of our House Manual and House Rules to facilitate and guide you.

summary:
Beautiful house in a SAFE and QUIET neighborhood, located in the middle of our cultural city. 24h/7d public transportation, the bus stop is STEPS AWAY from the house. After an exciting/busy day you can always come back home to relax.
We have hosted students & interns that went to DePaul, KENDALL, Inst. Medical Educ, IL Inst. of Art, Loyola, Argosy, Roosevelt, East-West, UIC, R. Morris, U. Of Illinois, Columbia, NEIU, Dominican, AIME, etc. Business, Companies, Clinics & Hospitals
transit:
Chicago is a huge city to explore if you want your stay to be memorable and exciting here are some things to do: easy access to see a CUBS or SOX game, visit the different diverse neighborhoods for the street festivals, see our amazing architecture in downtown, ride the double Decker bus, visit ALL of our beautiful amazing museums, Millennium park which offers free concerts, the Art institute, take a stroll on the magnificent Michigan mile, Navy Pier, plays and operas, also take a walk, run, biking or sunbathe in our beautiful beaches in front of the blue lake Michigan.

Want to continue the fun at night? There are lots of things to do such as dance clubs, lounges, bars, and movie theaters.
After an exciting day in the city you can always come to a very comfortable home. To relax in the backyard, take a nap, nice warm shower, read book or laid back and listen to music, so you can start another exciting new day.

We can provide visitors guides and city maps for free to explore the city. 
We suggest to buy a VENTRA (Public transportation) card in the Airport or at any CTA Line station, for a weekend or for a whole week depending of your days of stay. Also we suggest to buy a CITY-PASS if you want to do a TOUR in Downtown and save money during your enjoyable stay to have access to the most popular and amazing places in the city for a reasonable price.

access: Guests are allowed access to the entire apartment with exception of the furnace room and cleaning closet.
description:
Welcome to a Chicago Art decor apartment! This is the perfect place for a group of couples or just friends there are four bedrooms all with very comfortable beds pillow top orthopedic tops and the large kitchen will seat eight at the table if open up the leaf this apartment was made to entertain. with it being so to so many restaurants, bars, fun things to do around downtown.

Please make sure to take off shoes when in the unit we take much pride in keeping our place very clean. we even provide a plastic tray for shoes at each door!

Guests are allowed access to the entire apartment with exception of the furnace room and cleaning closet.

We are always available via airbnb app but if for some reason there is a question, concern, or problem we can be reached on the phone or via text we speak Fluent Spanish as well.

This neighborhood is called Lawndale. I love the neighborhood it has so much character full of beautiful grey stone two and three flats, and old world Chicago charm. If your a pizza person there is a Famous Lou Malnatis about 10 mins away. Lou does one of the best deep dish butter crust sausage pizzas ever conceived. Also there is Douglas Park about eight blocks east of the unit which is where Riot Fest is hosted.

One of the best things about this unit is the that the bus stop is only steps aways which will take you on a short three minute ride right to the Pink Line which you can take downtown and then to anywhere the "L" train goes. If your more of a driver I do have a gated parking spot on premises for you which you can access the unit almost right from your car. But like anywhere in the city always keep your eyes peeled when on public transportation.

There are kids in the building so it will never be as quiet as a library. Also please remember you are on the first floor with tenants living on the second floor and the basement. Please. NO shoes in the unit we have provided plastic trays at both entrances for shoes.

access:
you will have access to laundry - wifi- living room TV- back/side yard- grill- a light breakfast (toast /cereal/oats-coffee/tea-)
negoatiable parking- secure bike storage- 
Everyone in house shares laundry -kitchen/ living and dining space - 
There are actually 2 rooms and an apartment availble to rent so the possibility of meeting other Airbnb guests is high- or bring your friends!
smoking is allowed only outside in the yard or front porch-
description:
Welcome! Our home is 1 block from the blue line - minutes to some of the best resturants/bars in Chicago - 25 minutes to Ohare and Downtown (Loop)- your room is perfect for 2-enjoy a great kitchen, a lovely yard and lots of space to feel comfortable

This four bedroom /3 bath home was gutted and rehabbed in 2009- I love to cook so the kitchen was a focal point -with dishwasher -diposal and a large fridge
the house has central air and heat with a fireplace in the living room for winter chills
the rest of the house is roomy with a large living/ dining room area that could accommodate another 2 guests short term upon request and negotiation 
three of the bedrooms are on the second floor
-your room has a queen sized bed- a desk- a dresser and huge closet- 
-your bathroom is mainly private- it is the only toilet on the floor so during the day, other guests may use it but not the shower
there is laundry on the second floor 
- enjoy a lovely yard with a grill 
- there is one TV in the house -in the living room equipped with cable- apple TV 
- there is Wi-fi available for your use
-there is parking on the street - I have passes for you if you need
The house is one block from the Belmont blue line stop- one train stop or lovely walk to Logan Square- where some of the best restaurants and bars in Chicago can be found- It is 25 minutes from Ohare and downtown in either direction- 
Divvy is close and a great way to get to know the city in nice weather
There is a dog that lives on the premises - her name is ELLIE and she is very friendly

you will have access to laundry - wifi- living room TV- back/side yard- grill- a light breakfast (toast /cereal/oats-coffee/tea-)
negoatiable parking- secure bike storage- 
Everyone in house shares laundry -kitchen/ living and dining space - 
There are actually 2 rooms and an apartment availble to rent so the possibility of meeting other Airbnb guests is high- or bring your friends!
smoking is allowed only outside in the yard or front porch-

I usually am here to accomodate guests- if not my housemate ( Veronique)  will be here to make sure you are comfortable and have your needs met-

I love that my Avondale home is so close to hot areas (Logan Square-Wicker Park-Bucktown)- especially Logan Square - great restaurants and bars- yet keeping a peaceful residential feel about it- Im sure you'll be happy to have access to easily explore the city but might find you like the idea of staying home- to enjoy a nice evening in the yard -ordering chinese from "eat first" (down the block) and watching a movie

the Blue line ( which takes you to wicker park - bucktown and the loop ) is 1 block from the house- the belmont bus (which takes you to lincoln park,boys town and the lake) is also 1 block from the house 
To get here------
FROM OHARE- take the blue line to the Belmont exit - the house is one block from the train stop- a $20 cab ride 
FROM MIDWAY- take the orange line to the loop transfer to the blueline -direction OHARE- exit Belmont- 1block from the stop
$40 cab ride (estimated)

We are currently on a break from chicago and our co-hosts Graham and Brooke are taking care of the house and Airbnb guests- they also have a dog, her name is ELLIE she is very friendly and generally stays in the kitchen or in Graham and Brooke's room.
We also have house mate that can help you if I or Graham and Brooke are not available.
Please clean up after your self in the kitchen - almost everything goes in the dishwasher EXCEPT - pots, pans, and sharp knives- please let me know if there are any issues- low on amenities, TP extra towels etc. - thank you

additional_house_rules:
$75 extra fee per pet. Nonrefundable.

Please take shoes off in the apartment.

Tenants must vacate the premises at the expiration time and date of this agreement.

Tenants shall maintain the premises in a good, clean and ready to rent condition, and use the premises only in a careful and lawful manner.

The Tenants shall not sublet the property.

No animals or pets of any kind will be brought onto the premises unless prior agreement is made.

If the group exceeds the reserved number of guests without prior written consent, a $50 charge will be accessed per guest per night.

No smoking inside the premises. Smoking is permitted outside, but Tenant will be charged if any damage is caused to the property.  $200 fine for smoking inside the premises.

No firearms, fireworks or other hazardous material shall be in or on property.

Tenants shall use the property for legal purposes only and other use such as but not limited to, illegal drug use, abuse of any person, etc shall cause termination of this agreement.

The tenants shall behave in a civilized manner and shall be good neighbors respecting that rights of the surrounding property owners.

$30 key(s) replacement fee if keys are not returned.

The Landlord has the right to inspect the premises without prior notice at any time for unexpected repairs and/or to enforce the terms of this agreement. Should the Tenants violate any of this agreement the rental period shall be terminated immediately. The Tenants waive all rights to process if they fail to vacate the premises upon termination of the rental periods.

The Tenants and Tenants' Guest shall be hereby indemnify and hold harmless the Landlord against any and all claims of personal injury or property damage or loss arising from use of the premises regardless of the nature of the accident, injury, or loss. Tenants expressly recognize that any insurance for the property damage or loss which the Landlord may maintain on the property does not cover the personal property of Tenants and the Tenants should purchase their own insurance for Tenants and guests if such coverage is desired.

Tenants agree to pay all reasonable costs, attorney's fees and expenses that shall be made or incurred by Landlord enforcing this agreement
NO SHOES IN THE APARTMENT

access: Entire apartment is available for guests to enjoy, including the back deck.
description:
Experience Chicago living!  Open floor plan apartment in IRVING PARK CHICAGO.  Spacious 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms w/ an open concept kitchen/living and dining room. 2 miles to the Cubs Wrigleyfield, centrally located to many local restaurants, bars. Conveniently jump on the CTA bus at the corner to bring you all over town!  Come enjoy all Chicago has to offer!

Located in a classic Chicago brick flat that was renovated just a few years ago! It's very clean with hardwood floors throughout. Open living/dining room and kitchen.  Kitchen has maple cabinets, granite countertops and stainless steel appliances.

Washer / Dryer IN-UNIT

Bedroom 1 has a queen bed and bedroom 2 has a queen bed.  Den has a queen day bed. Air mattress and extra linens available for use if needed.

Smart TV and Wifi available in the apartment!

Entire apartment is available for guests to enjoy, including the back deck.

I am a 15 minute drive away in case of emergency.

Steps away from bus stops.  1.5 miles East brings you to the CTA Brown line. 1.5 miles West brings you to the CTA Blue line which goes from downtown to Ohare airport.  1.5 miles West also brings you to a Metra stop!

access: We have a fire pit in the back yard and a grill. You're welcome to hang out in the back yard, read a book in the hammock or just relax.
description:
A cozy spot with your own private entrance and bathroom. You'll have the entire bottom floor of our vintage 1910 house. Outside the bedroom is the southwest-themed bathroom and the TV/den area, complete with a comfy sectional and big TV. The washer/dryer are in the utility room, and you're welcome to use them! You'll have the whole floor to yourself so it's extra private. Super easy walking distance to tons of food, movie theater, Target and more.

Built in 1910 on an extra wide lot. Basement was renovated last summer and has a little polishing to do yet. Nothing that should affect cleanliness or comfort but we have adjusted the price to take the lack of polish into account. Private entrance!

We have a fire pit in the back yard and a grill. You're welcome to hang out in the back yard, read a book in the hammock or just relax.

I can probably hook you up with whatever you need, just ask! My connections are your connections.

This corner of Logan Square is a short walk to the Chicago River and borders a number of other cools neighborhoods (Roscoe Village, Bucktown, Lincoln Park). Easy walk to the beautiful Logan Boulevard, which is a great place to take a blanket and a book on a warm sunny day. Easy walking/biking distance (you can rent Divy bikes close by) to lots of stuff. We're right next to Elston Road, which has a great bike lane straight into downtown.

You can park out on our street. There is always plenty of parking. The street is permit-only, but we can give you guest passes to put in your car. Otherwise we're close to the Blue Line, as well as two good bus routes (Western Ave and Diversey Ave).

As mentioned earlier, you'll have the floor to yourself. Our laundry room is also downstairs but we try to avoid doing laundry while guests are with us. If we absolutely have to get some laundry done, we‚Äôll mention that when you arrive and try to figure out the best time to do it so we don‚Äôt disrupt you!

access: You will have access to the backyard and the entire apartment.
description:
Welcome to a unique historic block in the heart of the city!  Surrounded by Madison/Randolph Street night life, Little Italy, Greek Town, and the United Center,  you would be surprised how peaceful this little block can be.  Enjoy a serene walk in the neighborhood, or walk through to any of these great attractions.

After you enter through the private entrance, you'll open the door to a large living room that extends into the kitchen.  Two french doors lead you to the bedroom with ample closet space.  Finally, there is a stone covered bathroom with cozy towels and a tub for you to soak.   In the warmer months, take a drink out to the backyard to enjoy a beautiful rock garden and fountain.

You will have access to the backyard and the entire apartment.

My family and I live just upstairs, in the main house.  We are a text away in helping you with any questions, or to give tours of the Victorian house.

The block is a historic landmark itself, with this particular house  being built back in 1885!  Besides the attractions listed above, it is also located near Rush Hospital and UIC.

Because of it's central location in the city, there is lots to walk to.  However, you will also have 1/2 block access to the Jackson bus to downtown, 1/2 block access to the Ashland bus to the North or South sides of the city, and 1 1/2 blocks to the blue line train that connects anywhere you want to go!  If you are more of a driver, there is onsite parking and the highway (290) entrance is one block away.

description:
** Gone Oct 9 -20 so will need to do check in on Oct 8 at the very latest.** Wonderful place for your stay! The Lincoln Park neighborhood is home to the Lincoln Park Zoo, lakes and biking paths, and some of the city's best restaurants and nightlife. By all the great shops of North Ave, close to Mariano‚Äôs, Whole Foods, Trader Joe‚Äôs, and CVS. 8 min driving/Uber/Lyft ride to North Avenue Beach!! You can also take the Red Line CTA (a couple minutes walking from the place). Super convenient!

This wonderful room is ready for your stay! Feel free to use the living area and kitchen as well! Please note that the furniture in the pictures are old. There is different furniture and decor in the space now. I have my sweet dog with me. There is a doggy daycare that does pick up and drop off M-F so she isn‚Äôt there during the day. Let me know if you're not comfortable with the pup!

You can email, call, text with any questions you may have.

Close to the gorgeous shopping center and New City!! There are numerous shops and restaurants! If you're new to the city, be sure to explore this amazing Lincoln Park neighborhood!

Walking, CTA, Uber/Lyft, Divvy bikes

There are stairs access in the building, no elevator. At check in, I will be there to greet you. Please note checkin time is usually at 6:00 pm on the weekdays as I get home around 5:30 pm after work.

description:
This listing is for the garden apartment that includes the entire floor.

My place is close to:
Illinois Institute of Technology
College of Optometry
McCormick Place Convention Center
White Sox Stadium
Soldier Field
Downtown Chicago
Lakefront Bike Path and Beach
Hyde Park neighborhood. 

You‚Äôll love my place because of:
Clean 
Private
Rain shower
Full kitchen with ice-maker

My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

I consider myself to be an Ambassador of Chicago, so feel free to ask me for any information. I am happy to help with tailored directions and suggestions on where to eat or visit.

Bronzeville is a quiet neighborhood with a rich history. All of my neighbors are single families that care a lot about where they live.

Green and Red CTA Train Lines are a 10-minute walk away. The buses are 1-2 blocks away. 

McCormick Place is 7 blocks away.

additional_house_rules:
House Rules: Very simply, please respect my home and my neighbors. Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously, failure to comply will result in forfeiture of your deposit and/or termination of your reservation without a refund.  

1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable. 
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check-out fee. 
3.) No smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises. Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance. 
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily. 
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property. 
6.) Lockouts will result in a $150 fee per occurrence. Additionally, lost keys will incur a $50 per key fee.

access: You'll have full access to my 2 bedroom, 1 bath apartment, as well as the common building laundry room.
description:
*SPECIAL* Jan-Feb Stay 7+ nights at 20% off OR 30+ at 25% off! 

Our 2 bedroom apartment in Ravenswood, one of Chicago's vibrant and neighborly Northside neighborhoods, is ideal for your group! There's space for 6, and a newly renovated kitchen - though you may not have time to cook, with all of the family-owned restaurants nearby! Also nearby is the Montrose Brown Line station, which will take you down to the Loop in about a half-hour, and Lakeview / Lincoln Park in even less.

Once inside the building (a classic Chicago 3 flat), you'll go down a few steps, and into the apartment. The first room you'll see is our open kitchen / living room, with dining table separating the two. There's exposed brick throughout. Toward the front of the apartment is one bedroom, with a Queen-sized bed. Toward the rear is the second bedroom, also with a Queen-sized bed, and the apartment's full bath. There's a building laundry in a room beyond the apartment, and plenty of signage leading you there.

You'll have full access to my 2 bedroom, 1 bath apartment, as well as the common building laundry room.

Designed to be Chicago's first commuter suburb, Ravenswood became a primarily German neighborhood after being annexed by the city. Today, it's popular particularly with young couples who are looking for the urban experience to raise their families as well as the singles set who are attracted by the Lincoln Avenue entertainment strip, and a pleasure to walk around in, thanks to plenty of still-remaining Victorian architecture!

The Montrose Brown Line stop is about a 3 minute walk east. The 78/Montrose bus has a stop at the end of the block, and the 50/Damen bus has a stop just a 3 minute walk west, so it's easy to get around here without a car. If you do bring a car, however, there's plenty of street parking in the neighborhood.

In addition to easy access to and from the Loop, we're also close to picturesque Lincoln Square, and conveniently located down the street from Lillistreet Art Center and the Old Town School of Folk Music. It's 20 minutes on public transit, or a half-hour walk to Wrigley Field, a 10 minute drive to entertainment venues like the Music Box Theatre and the Metro, and a 10 minute walk to the Black Ensemble Theatre. And, since the neighborhood is diverse, you can find any number of restaurants - from places celebrating the neighborhood's German history, to brunch spots that mill their own flour, to West African.
house_rules:
House Rules: Very simply, please respect my home and my neighbors. Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously, failure to comply will result in forfeiture of your deposit and/or termination of your reservation without a refund.  

1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable. 
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check-out fee. 
3.) No smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises. Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance. 
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily. 
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property. 
6.) Lockouts will result in a $150 fee per occurrence. Additionally, lost keys will incur a $50 per key fee.

description:
Location, Location, Location!
Newport between Halsted & Clark
New to airbnb is my vintage Chicago greystone garden flat with private entrance and modern amenities on a historically landmarked street in the Lake View/Boystown neighborhood.

We're the hidden gem located on a quiet street between the bustle of Wrigleyville and Boystown. Our humble home - built in 1890 is the garden unit of a restored Lake View vintage greystone building. Walk to all local amenities, transportation, the beach, shops, cafes, restaurants and nightlife. Two double bedrooms and a full stone bath make this completely modernized space perfect for 1-4 people.


Basic kitchen for light meals and snacks that functions well as a wet bar
Guest controlled high efficiency central air conditioning and natural gas forced air furnace heating
Wifi
Ice maker
Coffee maker
Toaster 
Kettle
Hair dryer
Iron
Ironing board
Dishwasher



Upon arrival you can expect an initial greeting, key exchange and introduction to the space and surrounding area. Other than responding to your requests, guests can expect minimal contact from me. 

I love that Chicago landmarked this block of Newport Avenue to preserve its architectural significance as representative of high quality working class dwellings completed in the 1890's. Today, Newport Avenue and its big city surroundings are a vibrant example of what a diverse community of many cultures can be.

I am happy to make suggestions and use my resources to help you find what you're looking for to make your stay informed and memorable.

Excellent point for public transportation of all kinds: by foot, DIVY bike share, Zip car, bus, subway train, taxi, Lyft and √úber.

24 hour parking is available at a nearby paid lot at $25 per day. There is free street parking available with overnight passes I can provide. Please note street parking may be limited late at night. 

From O'Hare Airport (ORD) to Newport Avenue:
Public transportation on CTA Blue line train with bus connection at Belmont Avenue to Halsted stop. Travel time: 1 hour 22 minutes
Cost: Under 10 USD fare.

Taxi travel time: 30 minutes to 1 hour
Cost: 35-40 USD fare + tip

From Midway Airport (MDW) to Newport Avenue:

Public transportation CTA Orange line train to Roosevelt Red line to Addison stop.
Travel time: 1 hour 8 minutes
Cost: 5 USD fare

Taxi travel time: 30 minutes to 1 hour
Cost: 35-40 USD fare + tip

All within walking distance: Whole Foods, 7-11, Starbucks, Peets Coffee, Sidetrack, Steamworks, cheap late night tacos, Chicago Diner, HB, Berlin, pingpong, Wakamono sushi, Lake Michigan park, Rocks Bar & Grill, Smart Bar, Wrigley Field, Unabridged Books, The Laugh Factory, many taxis, √úber and public transportation to Uptown or the downtown loop.

access: Back door key will be provided to enter thru.
description:
Historical home built in 1898.  Maids quarters with private bath and hall leading to private staircase to 3rd fl family room. Shared spaces include front porch, back yard with grill and pergula, kitchen, living room with fireplace and dining room and family room.  Basement has washer and dryer to be shared as well.

Back door key will be provided to enter thru.

As much as guests prefers.  We are happy to share things to do in neighborhood or in city.

Beverly neighborhood is very family oriented with shopping and restaurants within walking distance.

Two block walk to metra train that takes you to downtown. 20 min ride to the loop in downtown.  From there you can go any where by bus, taxi, uber or subway.

We have a very friendly dog. We will keep him seperate during your stay. Unless you love dogs and want him around.

access: The guests will have access to all the areas except the master suite.
description:
Open and sunny apartment in the Logan Square neighborhood.

The space
Apartment located on a quiet block east of Humboldt Park.

Guest access
Guests have access to their own bathroom, living room, dining room, kitchen (full kitchen with most all standard appliances), and back deck with a grill.

The guests will have access to all the areas except the master suite.

Since the host lives on the property, there might be occasions when the guest and host will cross paths. The host will try to give the guests as much privacy as possible.

Humboldt park! Great for walks, relaxing by the pond or the pool or at the boathouse.
The 606! The abandoned rail line turned into a 2.7 mile trail that's like an open air museum!

Walking distance to some very vibrant neighborhood centres with a great night life.
Division Street- 1 mile
Logan Square- 1.2 mile
Wicker Park- 1.3 miles
Very accessible to CTA blue line with California, Damen and Division stops about a mile away to go downtown and the CTA buses 52 and 70 steps from the apartment.
And of course ubers and lyfts are plenty.

Parking is quite convenient in the neighborhood. Free parking is available on California ave and washtenaw ave which are just round the corner from the apartment.

Registration Number: R19000044388
house_rules: 11 pm to 7 am are quiet hours. That doesn't mean you have to be home by that time but in respect of the neighbors, please do your best to keep the volume low!

description:
Spacious bedroom with queen size bed, plenty of walking space. This is a 1 PRIVATE BEDROOM and a SHARED bathroom. I live here as well. I am on the second floor unit. We have PERMIT-FREE STREET PARKING . Free WiFi. Safe, quiet residential neighborhood, further away from the center but approx 30-40mins DRIVING distance to Downtown Chicago 20 min to Casino/Rosemont theater. *No laundry*We are Very close to Oak Park. **If you are from the Chicagoland area your booking will be denied**

This spacious bedroom is equipped with a smart tv, iron, ironing board and extra sheets. We also have a coffee machine with coffee for our coffee lovers. This room has central air conditioning and heating vents. The bathroom is shared but as stated in my reviews my house is spotless.
 Note:**You may only use the kitchens microwave and fridge space provided**
I do Airbnb in more than 1 room in this apartment. Please read house rules.All I do ask all those that book my place to shut the bedroom and bathroom doors gently, and walk gently (not heavy footed) .



FYI -From time to time I will dog-sit a small harmless chihuahua . She is a friendly, quiet, respectful. She doesn‚Äôt roam around the house at all. You will hardly see or hear her.

Most of the time I will be home to accommodate my guest.

The Galewood neighborhood is a diverse residential area. You may think of it as a hub, making access to mulitple attractions easy- going east takes you to Wicker Park/ Bucktown creative centers and into the Chicago Loop.  Then directly south you‚Äôll find Oak Park under 2 miles, it is known for  Frank Lloyd Wright Homes, unique boutiques, restaurants for great food, theaters, tourism and Breweries. 11 miles away from both midway and O‚ÄôHare airport.

Getting around the city is easy but time consuming especially with public transportation. If you use uber or lyft or even have a vehicle those are your best methods to get around fast and reliable. 

Public transportation is easy to take if you follow my advice and directions. Google maps makes it harder on those unfamiliar with the area.  If you do plan on taking public trans ask me and I will best advise you on getting around the city from my house.

I do request that you have a profile picture up during booking so we know who to expect.
Remember this is a private bedroom in the house I live in, which means you‚Äôll see me from time to time. I am understanding of everyone‚Äôs privacy/sleep schedules, I will keep it as quiet as possible and I expect the same in return. So please keep it quiet ü§´. 


Also if you plan on checking in early please let me know before hand. Same applies for late check outs. 
 The apartment is a 3 bedroom 2 bath house. I Airbnb two bedrooms out of 3. So as I‚Äôve stated it is imperative you respect privacy and sleep schedules. 

Coffee lovers! I do have a coffee maker and snacks available in the private room for your use only. 
Cooking after 9:30 is not permitted, the use of the oven is not permitted.
Laundry/room service is not available however we do live very close to a cleaners who have spectacular deals. 

Street parking is available in the area.

additional_house_rules:
- No pets allowed

- Third Party booking not allowed 

- Additional guest that are not part of the booking are not allowed 

- No eating on the bed

- No wet or dirty shoes on carpet

- No smoking in the house

- As a courtesy to us and future guests, please let us know if something breaks or is ruined

- Please treat my home like if it was your own

- Communication is key! Feel free to communicate freely with me on any issues, concerns or check in times

- If you‚Äôll be needing car service (taxi, Uber, Lyft) throughout your stay with us don‚Äôt hesitate to contact my husband Jesse Rosado. He is available to do pick ups, drop offs or any where you‚Äôre looking to go. Please provide pick up and drop off information as well as what time you need to be picked up. He will provide you with reasonable prices and let you know if he is able to provide you service during times needed. Accept all major credit cards, debit cards and/or cash. Phone: 718-820-6977.

description:
A large studio like room located downstairs. Equipped with a mini fridge, coffee machine, microwave, private living room for tv watching, and a few game activities. Parking available. 15-20 minutes drive to O'Hare International Airport. Close to restaurants, gas station, stores, etc.

Is this your first booking on Airbnb? Use this link to receive $40 off your stay.
www.airbnb.com/c/stephaniet15912

Are you ready to become a host? Use this link to get started.
www.airbnb.com/r/stephaniet15912

Beautiful large cozy Studio like room with a private bathroom. Room comes with a comfortable queen size bed that can sleep two guest. Have a twin size mattress for a third guest. Private bathroom comes with clean towels, body wash, toothpaste, mouth wash, blow dryer, paper towels, etc. Television with regular channels, Netflix & Hulu. Plenty of closet space for luggage or personal belongings. Room comes equipped with a mini fridge, coffee maker, microwave, private living room for tv watching, and a few game activities.

Washer/Dryer Room
Parking
Kitchen
