space: Beautiful large cozy Studio like room with a private bathroom. Room comes with a comfortable queen size bed that can sleep two guest. Have a twin size mattress for a third guest. Private bathroom comes with clean towels, body wash, toothpaste, mouth wash, blow dryer, paper towels, etc. Television with regular channels, Netflix & Hulu. Plenty of closet space for luggage or personal belongings. Room comes equipped with a mini fridge, coffee maker, microwave, private living room for tv watching, and a few game activities.
summary:
A large studio like room located downstairs. Equipped with a mini fridge, coffee machine, microwave, private living room for tv watching, and a few game activities. Parking available. 15-20 minutes drive to O'Hare International Airport. Close to restaurants, gas station, stores, etc.

description:
The Biddle House is located in Historic Old Town on a lovely tree-lined street, walking distance to many wonderful restaurants, shops and the lakefront. 

Features one queen bed in each bedroom and twin sleeper sofa, plus a single jacuzzi hot tub and shower.

The Biddle House is located in historic Old Town on a quiet tree-lined street, walking distance to wonderful restaurants, shops and the lakefront. 

Public transportation is a breeze from here - get downtown in 10 minutes on Chicago's famous El train (brown line)! You'll be a short walk from the Sedgwick Brown Line stop. 

The second floor apartment has two bedrooms, one bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen, dining room and living room. Continental breakfast fixings are provided. The units here get great natural light as well! 

The apartment includes high-speed internet (wi-fi), cable tv, private phone lines, and complimentary washer and dryer in the building. Apartment features one queen size bed in each bedroom and a twin size sleeper sofa in the living room. There is a single Jacuzzi tub and shower in the bathroom.  Max occupancy is 5.

Closest major intersection is North Avenue and Sedgwick Street. You'll be a short walk from the Lincoln Park Zoo, Chicago History Museum, world-famous Second City, great restaurants and bars like Twin Anchors (an old Sinatra hangout), Old Town Social, and Marges.

Old Town is the Historic District of Chicago. The neighborhood is beyond charming, located just north of the Gold Coast, filled with countless restaurants and boutiques, walking distance to the History Museum, Michigan Ave (15 min walk), DePaul University, Armitage Street and the Lincoln Park Zoo! A wonderful location to experience Chicago!

The Brown Line "L" is just 3 blocks away and takes you downtown in 10-15 minutes! Several Bus stops are near by as well.

2-4 Night Minimum based on Season.

additional_house_rules:
- You agree to the following:
- 
- CHECK-IN: is on or after 5 PM unless otherwise agreed to in writing as our cleaning staff needs sufficient time to prepare. Arriving onsite earlier without approval is trespassing 
- KEYS: to return any access keys and remotes with a $50 replacement fee for every lost key and $250 for any remote or entry FOB
- BUILDING STAFF/NEIGHBORS: you understand that building staff DO NOT work for us and will not assist you. Do not bother them. We typically host guests staying 30+ nights who tend to be familiar with the premises. If you happen to be an exception, do not share reservation details or engage in any activity that will disturb the tranquility of this residential community. Contact me or my team for ALL questions or directions. We pick-up phones until midnight and are eager to help you 
- QUIET HOURS/DISTURBANCE: between 9 PM and 9 AM. No parties, drug use, or gatherings of any kind. Any additional occupants in excess of the # on your reservation must be approved by me whether in your unit or in common areas. Any damage from you or your guests will result in immediate expulsion, at an additional cost to you, a claim with Airbnb and subsequent legal action 
- SMOKING: whether inside your unit, in a common area or roof deck, no smoking of any substance is allowed. Smoke damage to a unit will result in a $1000 fee
- PETS: you understand pets are not allowed in your unit. Pet damage may result in additional fees
- MISSING ITEMS: will be charged to you in a claim 
- ID CHECK: per the rules of this community, we'll request you submit your Government Issued Photo ID at the time of your e-check in via our site. You'll have to also agree to our terms of service. We're required to do a public records check for certain communities
- BREACH: any violation of the above shall result in immediate removal from the property at an additional cost to you
- BOOKING WITHIN 24 HRS: We'll send a request for a $500-1000 deposit which shall be fully returned on checkout

description:
Gorgeous Studio Unit in the heart of Chicago - Rivernorth. Professionally managed and fully stocked w/ everything from salt, pepper, shampoo and body-wash to a sparkling water welcome gift!

We are available to assist you with absolutely anything you need through midnight, 7 days a week

Cozy and modern apartment units situated along Chicago's River North District. A few minutes away from the Chicago Riverwalk, the Puerto Convention Center and the Shedd Aquarium, along with hundreds of art galleries and local museums. The brown and the purple lines are the main mode of transportation in the city. Amenities include a 24Hr fitness center, a business center with wifi hot spots, hospitable accommodation and a rooftop swimming pool. All units include a modern kitchen, floor to ceiling windows, in-unit washer/dryers and flat screen TV's. Free fast wifi, kitchen/cookware and bathroom amenities are also provided. For any concerns, our amazing customer support team is available to assist.

We offer rewards and complimentary upgrades to our regular repeat guests

description:
Welcome to our newly renovated home! It features an open space design, gorgeous hardwood floors & high ceiling.

Quiet & upscale suburb 5 min off of I-290, 8 min walk to the CTA Green Line Harlem Station & 20 min train or drive to downtown Chicago (w/ normal traffic). 5 min walk to Oak Park downtown: Whole Foods, Walgreens, restaurants, grocery, pubs etc. Easy access to Oak Park Rush Hospital, Loyola Med Ctr & Hines VA. Great for business travelers: printer, copier, iron, washer & dryer & more!

(a) Private bathroom and shower just for you and your guests! 
(b) Free street parking!
(c) The "Occupancy Tax" is about 7% here instead of the 23%+ in Chicago. We are close enough to the city without the excessive city price tag!
(d) Clean and comfortable beds because we know how important this is!
(e) Lightning fast 1 GB/s internet.
(e) 40'' 4k Samsung smart TV with FREE Disney+, Hulu & live TV!
(g) Bluetooth connected speakers in the bathroom with full bathtub available to make your stay exceptionally relaxing.

The host typically would like to greet the guest in person, but we do have self-check-in available should it requires.

We are right off of the Oak Park downtown area. It is the biggest and most prosperous hub in this neighborhood. We are just close enough that everything is right at your finger tips but far enough that when you go home, you feel the quiet and comfort that's called home.

(a) distance to other destinations (under normal traffic):

- plenty of buses within walking distance. 
- 5 min drive to I-290. 
- 8 min walk to Harlem Green Line Station. 
- 13 min walk to the Forest Park Library. 
- 14 min walk to Rush Oak Park Hospital. 
- 8 min drive or 30 min public transit to the Loyola University Medical Center. 
- 9 min drive or 35 min public transit to the Hines VA Hospital. 
- 15 min drive or 40 min public transit to the Stroger Jr., Hospital. 
- 15 min drive or 45 min public transit to UIC Medical center. 
- 20 min drive or 1-1.5 hr public transit to O'hare International Airport (ORD). 
- 20 min drive or 1-1.5 hr public transit to Chicago Midway International Airport (MDW).

(b) 5 days of free street parking available. If additional days of parking required, please let us know ahead of time - we may have additional paid private parking.

Park here and take the train to downtown Chicago to save $50-100/night on parking!

Since this is a new listing and we are still getting the rooms ready, the actual furnishing of the room may differ from the photos. But rest assured, we will make sure everything you see and feel is as good, if not better than the photos :)

access: In addition to the apartment, which includes mini-fridge stocked with water bottles, a studio area with bed and two couches, one of which is an IKEA futon, there is another room with two more couches, a bar stool and a book shelf, and single bathroom with shower. The front and back doors both lock, so your privacy is absolute. Past the locking back door there is a common area utility room with a full kitchen with microwacr, full size fridge, and wash machine that you are free to use. This area is shared by myself, my brother and both of our girlfriends, however we use it infrequently.
description:
Cozy, private and eclectic garden studio in Chicago's fun and scenic Lincoln Square neighborhood. Queen bed in main room, and fold out Ikea couch with giant SHARK sleeping bag, to easily provide sleeping for three guests. Four could work as well, if you don't mind squeezing a bit! 
Located in an area with ample and free street parking, The Hobbit Hole is a mere 10 minute walk to Lincoln Square proper, and the Chicago 'L' Brown Line for taking the train downtown and everywhere else in the city.

This space has an EXTREMELY powerful heater and air conditioner to keep you comfy during Chicago's extreme seasons, and comes with a 42" HDTV hooked up to an Xbox 360 with Netflix installed. High speed wireless internet is provided, along with hdmi, vga, and iphone input cables for the TV. 
There is a mini-fridge in the space that will be stocked with bottled water. The bathroom / shower area will be stocked with clean towels and single use shampoos / conditioners / body washes.
The street parking is also free and readily available if you're renting a car or driving in.
The bicycles on the rack belong to myself and my girlfriend and are unfortunately not for guest use, but if you're staying during a season when they'd be used, I'll have them removed in advance so I won't have to bother you if I decided to go for a ride.

In addition to the apartment, which includes mini-fridge stocked with water bottles, a studio area with bed and two couches, one of which is an IKEA futon, there is another room with two more couches, a bar stool and a book shelf, and single bathroom with shower. The front and back doors both lock, so your privacy is absolute. Past the locking back door there is a common area utility room with a full kitchen with microwacr, full size fridge, and wash machine that you are free to use. This area is shared by myself, my brother and both of our girlfriends, however we use it infrequently.

I'm the landlord for this entire apartment building, and my personal apartment is located directly above this space. Either myself or my girlfriend will be on the property 90% of the time to either personally let you in or answer any questions you might have.

Lincoln Square is a fantastic and fun neighborhood with lots of great restaurants, bars, and shops and parks. If you're looking for more nightlife or touristy sightseeing type stuff, I'd be happy to share recommendations. As a life-long Chicagoan who used to work on a tour boat, I know this city well.

This area has ample and free street parking, has rentable 'divvy' bicycles on the corner, is a couple of minutes walk from some major bus stops, and a ten minute walk from the brown line 'L' train, that is the most convenient way to get downtown and around the city in general.

description:
Private guest suite comprised of the entire ground level of a home on a quiet street in Bridgeport. Private entrance with keypad for self check-in. Spacious, open living area with a kitchenette, dining table, and living area. Sleeps 4 between queen-size sofa bed and king bed in private bedroom. Full private bathroom. Houseplants, cozy rugs and throw blankets, and pops of gold are featured in the decor, as well as handmade touches. The only space shared with your hosts is the backyard.

The @bridgeportbnb is a private guest suite comprising the entire ground level of a single family home on a quiet street in Bridgeport.  Free parking can be found on our street and neighboring streets. The private entrance has a keypad for self check-in with a code. There's a spacious open living area with a kitchenette, dining table, and living area with a queen-size sofa bed. 

The kitchenette has a coffee maker, mini fridge, toaster oven, microwave, blender, electric skillet, and waffle maker. The large master bedroom has a king bed, luggage rack, ironing board and iron, and white noise machine. Houseplants, cozy rugs and throw blankets, and pops of gold are featured in the decor, as well as handmade touches like the reclaimed wood shelf above the bed, umbrella holder, and embroidered "soft" and "firm" labeled pillowcases. 

The full, private bathroom has a walk-in shower with a dispenser of moisturizing shampoo and conditioner and shea butter and oatmeal body wash. The only shared spaces are outside the house - the entrance to the property, walkway on the right side of the house, and the backyard. There's a bistro table and four chairs in the backyard guests are welcome to use.

We're adaptable whether you'd like your space or you'd like to socialize! We live upstairs and can answer any questions quickly by text or phone. 

You may potentially interact with us when we're in the backyard with @crookedtailtrina. Trina, a registered therapy dog, lives upstairs. If you're not a dog person, we're happy to keep her on a leash when she's in the backyard. Alternatively, if you miss your dog or would like therapy dog cuddles, you're welcome let us know you'd to visit with her!

Bridgeport is a quiet neighborhood with lots of families, art galleries, good places to eat and drink, and easy access to downtown on public transit.

We are 0.2 mi (a four-minute walk) from the 35th and Aberdeen bus stop. The 35 bus stops at the orange, red, and green El train lines. 

The Loop, or downtown Chicago, is a 15-35 minute drive or 25-30 minutes by public transit. Take the 35 bus east to the red line El train, and ride the red line 4-6 stops north.

Take the 35 bus west to the 35th and Archer/Orange Line stop for the orange line to Midway airport. We are 25-35 minutes away from Midway Airport (MDW) by public transit or 15-40 minutes by car.

We are 1 hour 15 minutes away from O‚ÄôHare Airport (ORD) by public transit or 45-80 minutes by car. To get to O‚ÄôHare, take the 35 bus east (so you‚Äôll cross 35th Street to catch it) to the Sox-35th/Red Line stop and transfer to the blue line.
house_rules: Please wash any dishes you use and leave them in the drying rack.

description:
My modern home is clean, spacious, private, and friendly. 3 blocks to lake and beach. Red Line and bus stop both are 3 mins walking and steps from exciting shopping, bars, and restaurants. Location is key! 
Included in the room is wifi, kitchen use, 
my home is located in a safe area which is also very convenient. The room is on the basement

Location is very safe and convenient. station (24hr subway) is in 3 min walking distance.  It takes only 30 min to Chicago downtown by subway, and 25 min by bus. Supermarket and pharmacy are also within 5-10 min by walk. You can also enjoy the lake view by 10 min walk. Summer arrived, and you can go to the lake for a walk, swimming, playing beach volleyball, Chicago is a very beautiful city, because it has a lake Michigan, fortunately, my home close to the lake, very close, only need 10 minutes walk, enjoy the area.
 *Free street parking!* But I highly recommend using the CTA to explore Chicago

I will be on the property and have shared use of common areas. I will be available for anything you need during your stay. I live upstairs  and love meeting new people. We also have a deep love for our neighborhood and city and are happy to share our love of and recommendations for local restaurants, bars, shops, and activities. We know the city and are happy to point you in the right direction. You can text me for any help.
The listing is set up so that guests can check in and out without us. I am usually around, and available by phone. I am happy to interact or to give you space to enjoy a private stay.

access: The kitchen, full bathroom, dining room and living room are all accessible to guests. 5 minutes walk to the blue line to downtown Chicago. Nice neighborhood with grocery store, restaurants, bars, coffee shops, CVS all within a couple blocks! Easy to get to downtown Oak Park if you want to explore Frank Lloyd Wright houses, go to the movies or try out a new restaurant. Walkable and safe neighborhood.
description:
Comfy twin futon in living room in Oak Park for female guests and travelers. I live in a one bedroom apartment and opened up the living room as a shared space for female guests to stay the night on the twin futon. It would be a shared space-the living rooms all yours, and the bathroom, kitchen and dining room are shared with me. No outside guests thanks!

Guests can use the living room, dining room bathroom and kitchen!

The kitchen, full bathroom, dining room and living room are all accessible to guests. 5 minutes walk to the blue line to downtown Chicago. Nice neighborhood with grocery store, restaurants, bars, coffee shops, CVS all within a couple blocks! Easy to get to downtown Oak Park if you want to explore Frank Lloyd Wright houses, go to the movies or try out a new restaurant. Walkable and safe neighborhood.

Available via text, phone or in person. Happy to answer any questions about travel and transportation.

Ten minute walk to blue line Oak Park station to get downtown or to Ohare Airport. Close to restaurants, bars, greenhouse, ice cream shops, spa, grocery store and everything you may need! 2 miles from downtown Oak Park and Frank Lloyd Wright houses.

There is parking with the Oak Park parking app free for first three nights you just have to register your car each night on the app online. Public transportation to downtown-5 minutes to the blue line that allows you access to downtown in 30 minutes and to the airport in an hour!

access:
The English Room and French Room are on the first floor of our home.  The private bathroom on the first floor is reserved for our guests.  Guests are welcome to enjoy our sunny living room and dining room, back porch and back patio.

We have a private suite on the second floor of our home where we typically retire after dinner.
description:
You‚Äôll love our cozy house on a tree lined street!  The English Room has a queen bed and twin bed for 1 or 2 guests.  If your group has 3 or 4 guests, you can also book the French Room with full size bed for an additional $27 per person. If you want both rooms for 2 people, the cost is an additional $27 (register for 3 people). Private bathroom.  "Self Serve Breakfast" - boiled egg, cereal, coffee, and fruit- $10 value per person. 30-45 minutes bus/train to downtown Chicago and both airports.

The English Room and French Room are on the first floor of our home.  The private bathroom on the first floor is reserved for our guests.  Guests are welcome to enjoy our sunny living room and dining room, back porch and back patio.

Airbnb lists some places as "Oak Park residences" but they are in Chicago or other suburbs.  OUR HOME IS ACTUALLY IN OAK PARK.   

BREAKFAST AND FOOD PREPARATION
Guests can help themselves to a "Self Serve Breakfast" in our kitchen of coffee, tea, toast, boiled egg, fruit and cold cereal.   Instead of going to a restaurant for breakfast, you can start your day with a "Self Serve Breakfast"  - a $7-10 value per person..... and use the savings for lunch!

Guests have a dorm style refrigerator for yogurt, cheese, wine, etc.  and their own microwave on our back porch.

Pete's Market is located near the elevated train (EL) to the city.  They have a deli bar with salads and prepared dinners.  Some of our guests bring dinners home to microwave.  In addition to the kitchen, guests can eat on our front porch, back porch or on the patio in the garden of our back yard.

Sorry - no cooking - microwave only.

We have a private suite on the second floor of our home where we typically retire after dinner.

The English Room and French Room are on the first floor of our home.  The private bathroom on the first floor is reserved for our guests.  Guests are welcome to enjoy our sunny living room and dining room, back porch and back patio.

We have a private suite on the second floor of our home where we typically retire after dinner.

We are relatively new hosts with Airbnb.  We have traveled to many places in the US as well as Europe and Asia.  As a result, we know how important it is to get insights and help from local residents.  

We enjoy interacting with people from different cultures .  For several years, adults from Latin America, Asia and Europe lived in our home while they were learning English at Intrax Language School in Chicago.

Oak Park's tree lined streets and parks, unique restaurants and shops give Oak Park a "village feel", while being adjacent to a world class city.  Oak Park is known as a family oriented community close to downtown Chicago.  Kids are very active in sports and the arts year around and our schools are highly rated.

Access to downtown Chicago - The "Green Line" elevated train station in Oak Park is 25 minutes from downtown Chicago.  To get to the Green Line Station from our home, you walk two west blocks and catch the 86 bus on the west side of Ridgeland Avenue going south.  It takes 10 minutes to get to the Green Line.

The group has a private bathroom. 

Guests can help themselves to a "Self Serve Breakfast"  in our kitchen of coffee, tea, toast, boiled egg, fruit and cold cereal.   Instead of going to a restaurant for breakfast, you can start your day with a breakfast that is a $7-10 value and use the savings for lunch!
house_rules:
- The English Room has a queen bed and twin bed for 1 or 2 guests. If your group has 3 or 4 guests, you can also book the French Room with a full size bed for an additional $26 per person. 
- Quiet hours after 10PM
- Keep shared spaced neat and tidy.
- Rinse breakfast dishes and put into dishwasher.
- Place towels in bathroom on towel racks.
- Children age 5 or older with an adult are welcome.
- Turn off lights when you leave the room.

access: The entire master suite to include the washer and dryer, as well as the back yard are yours to use.
description:
Unwind and enjoy the city in our Cozy and Clean Guest Suite! Located just minutes from the Loop (downtown), I-90, as well as the United Center, enjoy staying in a great location close to everything Chicago has to offer! 

We're new hosts on Airbnb and super excited to begin having guests stay at our recently furnished guest space. 

We live in the main, separable part of the property and are excited for you to use our space as a home base for which to decompress or explore the city!

Stay in a cozy Noble Square Master Suite located on the edge of West Town/West Loop with an exposed beam, bamboo floors, TV with 125 + channels of cable, Netflix, Amazon Prime TV, wifi, walk in closet, as well your own oversized mini fridge, microwave and much more!

The entire master suite to include the washer and dryer, as well as the back yard are yours to use.

I am available by call or text (or a holler when I'm home), and would be happy to assist in anyway possible! If you like dogs, feel free to come meet my husky Jameson "Jamo" who will be your neighbor. If not, that's ok. He doesn't bark, so he won't bother you.

The neighborhood itself is somewhat quiet for Chicago, especially being just minutes from downtown! If you venture several blocks in any direction, you'll find busy streets bustling with nightlife, shopping and much more! Centrally located and close to the United Center, Fulton Market, the West Loop and River North night life, come relax here while nearly all of Chicago is at your fingertips!

Uber would be my suggestion. But you have several Blue Line "EL" stations within walking distance

access:
This is a free-standing 2-bdrm home that you have full access to (including washer and dryer in the basement).

Although not included in the rental, we have a lovely basketball court and side yard for our children‚Äôs enjoyment. You are welcome to use it with prior permission with the understanding that our family has priority. We ask that you keep in tidy and return it to its original condition.
 
Please note that the non-smoking policy applies both inside and outside: please do not smoke in the yard.
description:
This loft-style coach house was the former rectory of our converted church. It is a full detached home and dedicated guest/rental unit. A second 2 bedroom is also available next door.

Back on Airbnb after a year off, we moved in while our main house was being renovated. 

.The 2nd floor bedroom is a loft style with a king bed and ensuite bath. The 1st floor has smaller bedroom with a bunk. The bottom bunk is a full size and the top is a twin. There is a second full bath on the first floor. 3 day minimum for 4th of July, Labor and Memorial Day. 

There is a washer and dryer in the basement and a "pack & play" is available for infants. 

While the unit does sleep 7, we  don't accept reservations for a night of partying in the city.

Unfortunately we did have to cancel some reservations last year when we moved in due to an unavoidable move up date for our renovation. This is the only time that has happened and was an isolated incident that will not reoccur.

This is a free-standing 2-bdrm home that you have full access to (including washer and dryer in the basement).

Although not included in the rental, we have a lovely basketball court and side yard for our children‚Äôs enjoyment. You are welcome to use it with prior permission with the understanding that our family has priority. We ask that you keep in tidy and return it to its original condition.
 
Please note that the non-smoking policy applies both inside and outside: please do not smoke in the yard.

We live next door so we are available if needed.  Although you may it see us.

We are on the less congested side of Lincoln Park, one of Chicago's nicest neighborhoods. You'll find fine and casual dinning options within a short walk. DePaul university is within 4 blocks.

Don't miss the new Bloomingdales Trail (or "the 606," as locals refer to it), a 2.7 mile walk/jog/bike path, only a few blocks away. This former elevated train line has just been converted to one of the cities great public spaces. 

We are right next to a grocery store and a large selection of dinning options nearby. Coffee and pastries at Floriole cafe are not to be missed.

Street parking is unusually easy with plenty of spots available day or night. The metra train is 4 blocks away and the "L" train red line is 6 blocks. From either airport you can exit the blue line at Division and Ashland and take a bus north to Webster. 

There is also a Divy public bike rental close by. 

I usually recommend using uber to get around. Usually $10-$15 to get downtown.

Street Parking is very easy on our block.

Please no primary guests under 21. Do not book for parties or nights of binge drinking. (Yes, that means "no" to your bachelor/bachelorette party.)

Please refrain from flushing anything other than waste and toilet paper.

There is a washer and dryer in the basement and a "pack & play" is available for infants. 

While the unit does sleep 7, we  don't accept reservations for a night of partying in the city.

Unfortunately we did have to cancel some reservations last year when we moved in due to an unavoidable move up date for our renovation. This is the only time that has happened and was an isolated incident that will not reoccur.
summary: This loft-style coach house was the former rectory of our converted church. It is a full detached home and dedicated guest/rental unit. A second 2 bedroom is also available next door.
transit:
Street parking is unusually easy with plenty of spots available day or night. The metra train is 4 blocks away and the "L" train red line is 6 blocks. From either airport you can exit the blue line at Division and Ashland and take a bus north to Webster. 

There is also a Divy public bike rental close by. 

I usually recommend using uber to get around. Usually $10-$15 to get downtown.

description:
A perfect sized guest bedroom in a beautiful home in the best neighborhood in Chicago. 

Be close to all of the action in Chicago‚Äôs Lakeview neighborhood! You will be walking distance to Lake Michigan, Wrigleyville, Boystown, Belmont Theater District, Addison Station, Belmont Station, and much more.  Nightlife, retail shopping, coffee shops, and liquor stores all walking distance.

Great for people eager to visit one of the most diverse, cultured, and popular late-night neighborhoods in Chicago.

You will love my home because of the A+ location, amenities, and accessibility with a bus Stop right outside of the front door, Divvy Bike station directly across the street, and Belmont or Addison Red Line stops within 10 minutes walking distance. 

Great for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and groups (I have other rooms available per request)

This 2nd floor property is beautifully located in the heart of Boystown‚Äôs historic nightlife. This property is perfect for entertaining because of its open layout. You will also have access to the bar (provide your own booze), board games, and beer pong. (During summer months) guests will also have access to the back porch.

During your visit you will have access to Internet, in-unit Washer/Dryer, and reserved easy in & out driveway parking available for purchase so you don‚Äôt have to worry about checking on your car throughout your visit.

You will love this beautiful private space that is designed to make guests feel at home with an emphasis on community and occupation of common spaces. 

Central Air Conditioning and Heat
In-unit Washer/Dryer
Dining space for at the table and at the bar stool. 

2 Bathrooms, WiFi, TV (bring your own programming), 1 Bluetooth speaker in the common area, Towels and Linens, Coffee, Equipped Kitchen, Blow dryers, Let me know if there is anything specific you may need before or during your trip and I will do my best to accommodate! 

Wrigley Field = 9 minute walk
Addison Station = 9 minute walk
Boystown Bars = Seconds away
Belmont Station = 10 minute walk
Belmont Harbor = 16 minute walk

Magnificent Mile = 11+ minute car ride (depending on traffic)
Soldier Field = 15+ minute car ride (depending on traffic)
DePaul University Lincoln Park = 10 minute car ride (35 minute walk)
Aragon Ballroom = 10 minute car ride
Lincoln Park Zoo = 10 minute car ride (35 minute walk)
Millennium Park = 14+ minute car ride (depending on traffic)
United Center = 23+ minute car ride (depending on traffic)
Field Museum & Shedd Aquarium = 19+ minute car ride (depending on traffic)

Once your booking is confirmed you will receive check in instructions before arrival in your itinerary.

Nearby lockboxes with keys allow convenient check-in.
In & out driveway access for guests who purchase parking.

Close to Boystown, Wrigleyville, Lakeview, Belmont Harbor, Wrigley Field, Belmont and Addison L stations, Lakefront, Lake Michigan, Lincoln Park, SouthPort, and Andersonville. 

Located In a lively entertainment district that is surrounded by restaurants and bars. Bars close at 2:00am and 3:00 am Saturdays. 

Spacious apartment with great views and a great location.

Great place for Cub‚Äôs games, Pride, Market Days, Lollapalooza, St. Patrick's, and Chicago Marathon. You will literally be able to watch the pride parade, pride festival, and Market Days festival from the living room.

CTA Bus stop is outside of the front door.
Addison Station = 9 minute walk
Belmont Station = 10 minute walk
Divvy Bike station directly across the street.
Belmont Harbor = 16 minute walk

Parking can be purchased (onsite and offsite)

Please inquire about any questions regarding minimum and maximum length bookings, I am open to working on durations!

access:
Each guest will get personal Wishbox portal on their phone, where you will be able to see all the information you need for your trip, book early check-in or late check-out, reserve fun tours and activities or buy souvenirs.

All our locks digital so you would not need keys. You will have the entire two apartments all to yourself, which comes complete with living room TV ( Netflix, Amazon Prime and more ) kitchen and working space + FREE private parking in the back of the building.  We also offer 3D movies.

Inside our apartments we provide local guidebooks offering suggestions on "where to eat, where to go, what to see, and schedules for up-coming events."
description:
If you like a unique vibe, good energy, cool experience, eat or learn how to make Sushi or European food, wine, smoothies, fun activities, and tours or just relax in the front of the tv our home is for you! 

If you like someone to cook for you during your stay breakfast, lunch or dinner or take cooking/language classes also available. ¬†For families with kids, we offer babysitter options inside of your apartment you will stay.¬† All our locks to apartments and rooms are digital so you would not need to worry about security & keys.

Property professionally managed by Ran Fridman - Airbnb Superhost with more than 15 years of experience in the Hospitality Industry worldwide. ¬†We take care of each guest like Family, come and experience our hospitality. 

Thank You and we're looking forward to hosting you, my friend,¬†

Fridman Properties Family

This listing for 2 apartments in same building total of 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, 2 living rooms, 2 kitchens and can accommodate up to 14 guests.  Sleeping arrangements are 1 queen size bed, 2 twin size beds,  12 single bunk beds, 2 couches and the rest are air mattresses. Please note smoking allowed on the porch or outside NOT inside of the apartment. 

We offer everything, from cellphone chargers, washer and dryer, printers, hairdryers, umbrellas, irons, and all the necessary toiletries, including even makeup removal. 

Come and enjoy our hospitality & see why our guests keep coming back. 

Fridman Properties Family

Each guest will get personal Wishbox portal on their phone, where you will be able to see all the information you need for your trip, book early check-in or late check-out, reserve fun tours and activities or buy souvenirs.

All our locks digital so you would not need keys. You will have the entire two apartments all to yourself, which comes complete with living room TV ( Netflix, Amazon Prime and more ) kitchen and working space + FREE private parking in the back of the building.  We also offer 3D movies.

Inside our apartments we provide local guidebooks offering suggestions on "where to eat, where to go, what to see, and schedules for up-coming events."

We love to help visitors!  We take care of each guest like family.  We want your experience in Chicago to be AWESOME.  Please see our guest‚Äôs feedback & testimonies; actual clients who stayed with us.  We assist students, faculty and visitors with many other services as well ... like helping  you to find long term rentals if you are relocating, room rentals for functions, meetings and study rooms, airport pick up & drop off services, storage space, moving, renting or buying furniture,  shopping, driving lessons, opening bank accounts and much more!  Please contact us for complete details.  We are here to help you to focus on studying, working or to simply have a great time doing what you love to do best!  We also offer 50% off on special tickets to the Science and Industry Museum + FREE parking and even 3D movies for your entertainment.  We sincerely hope you will have a truly pleasant stay with us.

Near historical Washington Park, University of Chicago and within walking distance to Garfield Green Line train station that will take you 20-25 minutes to McCormick Place  and 30-35 minutes to Downtown Chicago for only $2.50 per train ride.

We provide transportation from the airport, for your safety and convenience for only $69.00 and someone will even meet and greet you at the airport baggage area to help you carry your bags.  We want you to fully enjoy your stay with us, worry free.

Our property is right off I-90/94 highway, only 4 blocks from Garfield (Green) Station CTA, which will take you to the McCormick Place in 20-25 minutes and the University of Chicago shuttle bus also stops nearby.

We also enjoy helping students, faculties, and visitors with many other various services, like helping  you to find long term rentals if you are relocating, room rentals for functions, meetings and study rooms, airport pick up & drop off service, storage space, moving, renting or buying furniture, shopping, driving lessons, opening bank accounts and much more.  Contact us for full details.  We're here to help you focus on studying, working or to simply have a good time doing what you love to do.  We want you to remember and enjoy your stay with us.

neighborhood_overview:
Near historical Washington Park, University of Chicago and within walking distance to Garfield Green Line train station that will take you 20-25 minutes to McCormick Place  and 30-35 minutes to Downtown Chicago for only $2.50 per train ride.

We provide transportation from the airport, for your safety and convenience for only $69.00 and someone will even meet and greet you at the airport baggage area to help you carry your bags.  We want you to fully enjoy your stay with us, worry free.

space:
This listing for 2 apartments in same building total of 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, 2 living rooms, 2 kitchens and can accommodate up to 14 guests.  Sleeping arrangements are 1 queen size bed, 2 twin size beds,  12 single bunk beds, 2 couches and the rest are air mattresses. Please note smoking allowed on the porch or outside NOT inside of the apartment. 

We offer everything, from cellphone chargers, washer and dryer, printers, hairdryers, umbrellas, irons, and all the necessary toiletries, including even makeup removal. 

Come and enjoy our hospitality & see why our guests keep coming back. 

Fridman Properties Family
summary:
If you like a unique vibe, good energy, cool experience, eat or learn how to make Sushi or European food, wine, smoothies, fun activities, and tours or just relax in the front of the tv our home is for you! 

If you like someone to cook for you during your stay breakfast, lunch or dinner or take cooking/language classes also available. ¬†For families with kids, we offer babysitter options inside of your apartment you will stay.¬† All our locks to apartments and rooms are digital so you would not need to worry about security & keys.

Property professionally managed by Ran Fridman - Airbnb Superhost with more than 15 years of experience in the Hospitality Industry worldwide. ¬†We take care of each guest like Family, come and experience our hospitality. 

Thank You and we're looking forward to hosting you, my friend,¬†

Fridman Properties Family

additional_house_rules:
1. Not suitable for children (0-12 years) and pets.
2. No shoes in the house please.
3. No smoking, parties, or events.
4. No visitors allowed other than the people listed on the reservation without prior approval.
5. After you use the kitchen, please leave everything clean and organized.
6. Please turn off the lights when you leave the room or go to bed.
7. You will have a set of keys. If you lose it, you will be charged $30 fee.
8. Please be conscientious of your noise since you will be sharing the house.
9. Check in is from 3pm to 11pm. Check out is before 11am. If your check out is after 11am you will be charged a $30 fee.
10. Quiet time is from 11pm. It means that after 11pm common areas such as kitchen, and living room will be closed.

We are committed to provide a great stay for you, so if you have any question or an issue, please let us know immediately in order to help you or fix it right away instead to tell us in your review.

access: You will have access to your private room and private bathroom, and shared spaces such as living room, kitchen/dinning room, and a desk to work at.
description:
Welcome to our home. My husband and I live in this house which is located two minutes walking from the blue line, just at the exit of the I90/I94 highway. This location is perfect since is just in the middle between O‚Äôhare Airport and downtown in a great neighborhood.
20 minutes to O‚Äôhare. (Blue line)
20 minutes to downtown. (Blue line)
15 minutes to Wrigley Field. (direct bus on addison st)

If you have car, you can go to O‚Äôhare or downtown using the I90/I94.

There a lot of windows around the house so it is very illuminated with natural lights during the day. All the areas are very spacious and charming. You are going to feel like home.
	There are a lot of free street parking in front of the house (be careful with the rush hour time during the weekdays), and also there is a parking spot available in the garage of the house, too.
	We sleep downstairs in the basement since we own a friendly and well-behaved dog. He has no access, therefore probably you will not interact with him. You may hear him but he usually is very quiet.

You will have access to your private room and private bathroom, and shared spaces such as living room, kitchen/dinning room, and a desk to work at.

I will answer you ASAP.

access: House is not wheelchair accessible
description:
This is a well presented, beautiful, contemporary decorated 3 bedroom 2 bathroom
house with a fully furnished carpeted basement. The house is in close proximity
to excellent transport links (24hrs) to downtown Chicago, also to the malls and
golf courses. It is situated between the border of Chicago and Evanston.

This ranch house is located in a Quiet neighborhood but has easy access to all
the fun activities in downtown Evanston and Chicago. With fine dining
and great night life just a few minutes away. Or you can stay in and enjoy the
cozy living room.
 
Washer and Dryer equiped.

Stainless steel appliances. All bedrooms are fully loaded flat screen t.v with Direct TV and free WIFI.

Perfect for your summer Barbeque grill master!  Patio with charcoal grill and rotisserie capabilities. Driveway for two cars. Plenty of free street parking available. Easy access to public transportation, including bus and trains direct to downtown Chicago and Evanston.


Sadly, The house is NOT available for parties.

There is a two night minimum.

Very flexible and friendly host

House is not wheelchair accessible

It is a 2min walk to the bus stop, and a 7 min ride to Howard train station.

additional_house_rules:
***PLEASE NOTE: The washing machine can not handle towels or sheets. Please do not wash towels or sheets in the washer. You may leave them out for housekeeping to pick up.***

The wash machine is located out the back door and down the stairs.
 
House Rules
1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable.
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check-out fee. 
3.) No smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises. Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance. 
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily. 
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property.
6.) Lockouts will result in a $150 fee per occurrence.  Additionally, lost keys will incur a $50 per key fee.
7.)Do not set thermostat temperature below 65 in winter time.

access: Guests have private access to the unit.
description:
*SPECIAL* Dec-Feb Stay 7+ nights at 20% off OR 30+ at 25% off! 

2 Bedroom centrally located in the great neighborhood of Wicker Park. Easy to get all over the city of Chicago to explore! The apartment is very roomy and comfortable even with up to 7 guests! Enjoy a newly renovated bathroom!

This hip and centrally located 2nd floor apartment has 2 bedrooms, and 1 newly updated bathroom with full kitchen and living room. The apartment is located in the hip neighborhood of Wicker Park. There are 5 beds (1 King bed, 1 Queen bed, 2 twin beds and a pull out couch) and can accommodate up to 7 people!

Please keep in mind older Chicago buildings have character, but they may also appear less clean. The unit is thoroughly cleaned between each guest and all bedding and towels are provided and cleaned prior to each new guest. 

This 2nd floor apartment is centrally located in Wicker Park with less than a 10 min cab ride to to Downtown, Lincoln Park, Wrigleyville and close easy access to the freeway, public transportation and nightlife. This is a 2 bedroom apartment with 5 mattresses total (1 king, 1 queen and 2 Twins plus a pull out couch in the living room). There is a large walk in closet that is wide open for your things so you can unpack and make yourself at home.  There is wi-fi internet with password provided upon booking. The TV is DISH network with all HBO, Showtime, Sirius Satellite Radio and hundreds more stations. Plus DVR so you can enjoy your time out in Chicago and watch your favorite shows when you get back home snuggled up on the couch!  

The sleeping/bed lay out is: 
Bedroom 1: King Bed
Bedroom 2: Queen Bed
Livin Room: 2x Twin Beds and a pull out couch
Walk in closet: Hammock 

The apartment is all yours. Completely private.  The kitchen is stocked with plates, silverware, cooking supplies and you are welcome to use anything in the kitchen including any food that is there.  The backyard is shared by the building's 2 other tenants, but please go enjoy some time outside if its nice out.  

The apartment is thoroughly cleaned between every guest but due to being a building from 1890 - it has some wear and is not a sparkling brand new construction home. I hope you understand :)

Guests have private access to the unit.

One of Chicago's creative epicenters lies just west of downtown Chicago in Wicker Park and Bucktown. These synonymous neighborhoods are famous for unparalleled boutique shopping, esoteric book stores and their countless art galleries ‚Äî many housed within the Flat Iron Arts Building. If you have an acute knowledge of craft cocktails and an affinity for independent clothing designers, there's no better area to sip and shop in the country.

The North Avenue and also the Ashland  buses run about every 10 Minutes and are less than a block away.  The Blue line El stop at Damen is a 10 min walk away, the El stop at Milwaukee is also 10 min walk but not down as nice of a street. Taxi downtown is $10/10 min, taxi to Lincoln Park/Wrigleyville is $10/10 min. Taxi to Ohare or Midway is $40 and can range from 30 minutes without traffic to 1 hour with bumper to bumper traffic. There is free parking on the street, but be careful, around the corner from the house is a ZONED parking area which requires a permit, do not park on Bosworth. 

DIVY Bikes are the public bike rental service with parking locations all over the place in Chicago. It is $7 for a 24 hour pass.  This is a great way to get around the city.  There is a station at Marshfield and Cortland which is 1 block north and 1 block West,  or you can go to Ashland & Blackhawk which is 3 blocks South.

If you are traveling with a baby or young children, we have a pack and play available for use. Please let us know prior to arrival so we can have it available for you.
house_rules:
***PLEASE NOTE: The washing machine can not handle towels or sheets. Please do not wash towels or sheets in the washer. You may leave them out for housekeeping to pick up.***

The wash machine is located out the back door and down the stairs.
 
House Rules
1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable.
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check-out fee. 
3.) No smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises. Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance. 
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily. 
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property.
6.) Lockouts will result in a $150 fee per occurrence.  Additionally, lost keys will incur a $50 per key fee.
7.)Do not set thermostat temperature below 65 in winter time.

If you have an acute knowledge of craft cocktails and an affinity for independent clothing designers, there's no better area to sip and shop in the country.

access: You'll have full access to the apartment: WiFi, 2 Bedrooms (queen beds - each sleeps 2, new sheets), Living Room (sofa - sleeps 1, new sheets), Cable TV, Full Bath (new fluffy towels, sink, toilet, large shower, body wash, shampoo, conditioner), Kitchen (fully equipped!)
description:
April 2016 - gut-rehab available in Lakeview/BOYSTOWN! Beautiful, designer furnished, 2 bedroom apartment steps from Lake Michigan, local shopping, Boystown, Wrigley Field and public transportation.  20 minutes to downtown museums and Millennium Park. 15 minute walk to Wrigley Field.

This  new rehab offers a fresh, contemporary look designed and recently updated (2018) by renowned Chicago interior designer Robert Zizzo, of ModlifeHome.   Upon entering the apartment you'll be delighted by the clean, sun-drenched living room, dining area, kitchen and bedrooms.  Everything in the apartment is new - towels, sheets, pillows, furniture, dishes, kitchen appliances, washer/dryer.  You name it, it's brand new including high end firm Tulio mattresses
(9/2018).

The neighborhood is bustling yet the apartment is located in a beautiful Chicago greystone and nestled on a quiet, tree-lined street. A reserved parking space is available. Please inquire.

You'll have full access to the apartment: WiFi, 2 Bedrooms (queen beds - each sleeps 2, new sheets), Living Room (sofa - sleeps 1, new sheets), Cable TV, Full Bath (new fluffy towels, sink, toilet, large shower, body wash, shampoo, conditioner), Kitchen (fully equipped!)

I want you to enjoy your stay.  Upon check-in you'll find a Welcome Guide on the kitchen counter that features home instructions, city attractions, local restaurants, bars and shopping, how to get around town, in case of emergency instructions and a local map.

Anchored by a beautiful stretch of shoreline to the east and dotted with train stops from two ‚ÄòL' lines, Lakeview is one of Chicago's liveliest and most accessible neighborhoods. Several distinct areas ‚Äî East Lakeview, Central Lakeview, Boystown and Wrigleyville ‚Äî meld together to form a lakefront community that celebrates diversity and boasts something for every type of visitor.

Arts and culture come in the form of live music venues, several summer street festivals and a thriving scene for theater, dance and comedy.

Not to be outdone by its extraordinary entertainment landscape, Lakeview makes full use of its slice of Lincoln Park, a 1,200-acre oasis dedicated to the outdoors. Here you will find the scenic Lakefront Trail, a golf course and driving range, a boat harbor, a bird sanctuary, tennis courts and grassy playing fields that are also perfect for picnics or just soaking in the views.

Chicago is a walking city with an easy-to-navigate public transportation system.  The Belmont L station, serving both the Red and Brown train lines, is 3 blocks away.  Two CTA bus routes are 1/2 block away - Halsted #8, Broadway #36. A Divvy Bike station is 1/2 block away and the Lakefront running path is 2 blocks away. 15 Minute walk to Wrigley Field.

access: Wi-fi, washer/dryer, private mini fridge, lovely park nearby. Shared bathroom, living room, and dining room as well as full use of spacious kitchen and cookware.
description:
Very nice, updated apartment in Lincoln Square! This sunny artistic apartment is on the 3rd floor of a great building with super friendly neighbors. You can walk to all that Lincoln Square has to offer! The location is ABSOLUTELY AMAZING, near the train, and within arms reach of everything you could possibly need or want - You'll find a Mariano's, CVS, the Davis Theater, high-end cocktail bars, pubs, library, farmers market, and restaurants galore. You name it and Lincoln Square's got it.

Beautiful apartment with great amenities including in-unit washer and dryer! You'll have access to the living room, bathroom, kitchen and of course your private room along with all appliances, including a mini fridge in your room for your convenience. The living room also offers 48" HD Smart TV with Netflix and a collection of new movies if you'd like to watch!

Wi-fi, washer/dryer, private mini fridge, lovely park nearby. Shared bathroom, living room, and dining room as well as full use of spacious kitchen and cookware.

I will be available to help you on the spot when needed!

"No wonder this is one of Chicago's favorite north side neighborhoods!"
Lincoln Square combines old world charm, fantastic city parks, amazing local restaurants, and is rated "a walker's paradise" by WalkScore - a 98! It includes a variety of micro-neighborhoods and Chicago history - Rosehill Cemetery and Bowmanville, Welles Park and Sulzer Regional Library, a lovely portion of the Chicago River, and terrific locally-owned shops and restaurants in the Square itself. Old Town School of Folk Music, Cafe Selmarie, historic Kraus Music (Studio V), Chopping Block and the famous Lincoln Statue are some of my favorite landmarks. The Brown Line cuts through Lincoln Square making transportation anywhere in Chicago a breeze. Kids come from all over Chicago to play baseball and football in the Welles Park sports programs.

5 minute walk to Brown Line train (the "L") that will take you downtown in ~20 minutes. There is free parking on the street.

The apartment is located just east of Western Ave. and just off of Lawrence. The main strip of Lincoln square restaurants is a couple blocks away and even those couple blocks have some of our favorite bars (definitely recommend The 6th) and restaurants. 5 minute walks to Mariano's for groceries and Corepower Yoga. CVS is around the corner for essentials. Also within walking distance to all that Ravenswood and Andersonville have to offer.

description:
Spacious-Comfortable & Luxurious- Perfect for Relaxing and Entertaining!

This North Center beautiful home is located just blocks away from Lincoln Square and Wrigley Field. Close to Brown Line and Irving Park/ Western city bus stops. 
The exquisite home has over 3600 sq. ft. making it the perfect choice for families and close friends to spend quality time together in luxury and comfort.
The first floor consists of a beautiful living room and kitchen perfect for any gathering. 
The large Chefs kitchen which has Viking double ovens and 6 burner cooktop, microwave and refrigerator are ideal for sharing and cooking old family recipes. Off the rear of the kitchen is a mudroom where the washer and dryer are located.  
The second floor has 2 sun-filled queen size bedrooms that share a beautiful bathroom with a double bowl vanity and granite countertop.
The master bedroom suite is also on the second floor with an en-suite master bathroom which also has a double bowl vanity and a Jacuzzi tub perfect to unwind in.    
There is also a 3rd-floor suite for groups of 8 or more (Please contact me for availability and pricing.)  The suite is a beautiful open space that is completely versatile. It can be used as a large family room or a communal bedroom that can easily sleep, 8 people. It's actually the perfect space for single folks who are traveling solo and don't mind sharing a room; or a group of children that get to enjoy a sleepover with friends and family. The suite also has a beautiful bathroom which features a 2 person soaking Jacuzzi tub surrounded by beautiful marble tile. 
The backyard has 3 private outdoor decks attached to the house and large beautiful deck on the garage. In season you will be surrounded by flowers and plants. It is a great atmosphere to relax and enjoy the beautiful outdoors.
During the Holiday Season, the house will be decorated with a Christmas tree as well as other holiday decorations, making it a perfect holiday getaway!

If you put up the umbrella, please be sure to close it when you leave if it is windy  ÔÉòIf you run into our dogs, Paris (Doberman) or Tigger (Cocker Spaniel) in the yard, feel free to pet them, as they think all humans belong to them!  ÔÉòLet us know if you need extra towels  ÔÉòWe welcome families to stay with us. However, we do not lease to anyone under the age of 21. If you are traveling with anyone under the age of 21, they are not allowed to be left on the property unattended  ÔÉòNo alcoholic beverages will be served to minors. If a parent or guardian does allow this, we will call the police and will terminate the remainder of your stay.

description:
Your spacious, open floor plan, 2 bed 2 bath apartment is waiting for you! The views of the city through your big bay windows will have you eager to get out and explore! You will have access to all the first-class features our building has to offer including rooftop sundeck with breathtaking city views, outdoor pool and Al fresco fire pits and grilling stations just to name a few! Stay somewhere with comfort and style! Stay somewhere you won't want to leave! Chicago welcomes you!

Our community is packed with luxury, convenience, comfort, and style. With amenities like a stunning rooftop sundeck (breathtaking city views included), beautiful outdoor pool with trellised shade areas, indoor Whirlpool spa, sauna, and steam rooms you will never want to leave. After all, everyone can use a little rest and relaxation in their life, right?  
Don't let traveling interrupt your fitness goals. We have a top of the line fitness center and yoga studio. No excuses not to burn a few calories. Maybe working out isn't your thing. No worries! We have a wonderful entertainment lounge with a Billiard table and a deluxe private theater with surround sound. We have something for everyone and it is planted in the heart of The Windy City!

* Stunning rooftop sundeck with breathtaking city 
* Beautiful outdoor pool
* Al fresco fire pits and grilling stations
* Fitness center and Yoga Studio
* Indoor Whirlpool Spa, Sauna and Steam Rooms
* Extensive entertainment lounge with gourmet kitchen
* Premiere business suite
* Deluxe private theater with surround sound
* Enjoy complimentary Starbucks in our lounge
* Round the clock concierge services
* Private dog walk and pet wash

24 hour Concierge available.

Chicago sits on the bold, beautiful coast of Lake Michigan and our property is just a mile east of it. Mix a little lake life with city life and you are in a great location! Staying at our property gives you amazing access to the hottest Chicago landmarks that you can get to in minutes! Do a little shopping at Magnificent Mile and take in the picturesque views of the Chicago River. 
The city is full of history and there are several tours you can take to get its background. The Chicago River Architecture Cruise is a must-do! 
If you visit during the warmer months you should definitely swing by Wrigley Field for a Cubs game, take a walk through Lincoln Park Zoo (it's free) and don't forget Navy Pier. If it's the chilly season, dress warm, really warm, and don't let that stop you. Go out and explore!
Get a taste of Chicago with any of the numerous authentic restaurants, cafes, and pubs. There are so many to choose from! Fill your belly, wet your whistle and dance the night away. The nightlife scene in Chicago amazing. 
Our city is special, it has something for everyone and it is waiting for your visit!

You will be staying in the heart of Chicago. It is a Walker's Paradise, Rider's Paradise and very bikable area! No car necessary! 
If you do bring one public parking is available and not included in any rental. There is public parking available next to the building. The entrance is off Hubbard Street. Additional public parking available at 414 N. Orleans. 

If you need to find parking throughout the city while you are out and about, download the app Spot Hero! It will give you locations as well as pricing. 

You are just 0.5 miles from both Olgilvie and Union Station.  
Trains
- Union: Metro, Amtrak 
- Olgilvie: Metra
- The Ventra and Metra Apps are great tools
CTA
- Train and Bus - Several stops within 0.2 mi 
- The Chicago Transit - CTA App is a great tool

The App Transit will give you the best way to get to your destination using public transportation. It will also include any ridesharing options available. 

Local Airports
O'Hare International Airport (ORD) 11mi
Chicago Midway International Airport (MWD) 9.2mi
house_rules:
- * No Smoking
- * No Parties
- * Public Parking is available and not included in any rental. There is public parking available next to the building. The entrance is off Hubbard Street. Additional public parking available at 414 N. Orleans. 
- *Pet $200 fee. Non-refundable. Additional damage fees may apply. Must know prior to arrival, One cat or one dog. only. No aggressive breeds. Maximum 35 pounds
- To ensure the best stay experience we run a simple background check prior to accepting a booking. A short-term renters insurance policy is also created for all guests. There are no additional fees for the background check or insurance policy.
interaction: 24 hour Concierge available.
neighborhood_overview:
Chicago sits on the bold, beautiful coast of Lake Michigan and our property is just a mile east of it. Mix a little lake life with city life and you are in a great location! Staying at our property gives you amazing access to the hottest Chicago landmarks that you can get to in minutes! Do a little shopping at Magnificent Mile and take in the picturesque views of the Chicago River. 
The city is full of history and there are several tours you can take to get its background. The Chicago River Architecture Cruise is a must-do! 
If you visit during the warmer months you should definitely swing by Wrigley Field for a Cubs game, take a walk through Lincoln Park Zoo (it's free) and don't forget Navy Pier. If it's the chilly season, dress warm, really warm, and don't let that stop you. Go out and explore!
Get a taste of Chicago with any of the numerous authentic restaurants, cafes, and pubs. There are so many to choose from! Fill your belly, wet your whistle and dance the night away. The nightlife scene in Chicago amazing. 
Our city is special, it has something for everyone and it is waiting for your visit!
space:
Our community is packed with luxury, convenience, comfort, and style. With amenities like a stunning rooftop sundeck (breathtaking city views included), beautiful outdoor pool with trellised shade areas, indoor Whirlpool spa, sauna, and steam rooms you will never want to leave. After all, everyone can use a little rest and relaxation in their life, right?  
Don't let traveling interrupt your fitness goals. We have a top of the line fitness center and yoga studio. No excuses not to burn a few calories. Maybe working out isn't your thing. No worries! We have a wonderful entertainment lounge with a Billiard table and a deluxe private theater with surround sound. We have something for everyone and it is planted in the heart of The Windy City!
summary: Your spacious, open floor plan, 2 bed 2 bath apartment is waiting for you! The views of the city through your big bay windows will have you eager to get out and explore! You will have access to all the first-class features our building has to offer including rooftop sundeck with breathtaking city views, outdoor pool and Al fresco fire pits and grilling stations just to name a few! Stay somewhere with comfort and style! Stay somewhere you won't want to leave! Chicago welcomes you!

description:
The place: A cozy bedroom and private bathroom (with a jacuzzi tub) available in a 3 bedroom, 2 bath condo. My boyfriend and I live in the master bedroom at the end of the hall. 

We also have a private deck out back complete with a grill and deck furniture. Fantastic for hanging out outdoors!

The common spaces are completely open for you to use! The kitchen has a long marble counter, perfect for a quick snack. The living room TV is a Roku smart TV and has a Chromecast set up as well so you can stream from your phone / laptop easily.

There is a smart lock for easy access easy and out. Also a Nest thermostat for the heat / AC.

Any questions? We may be busy with work during the week or out of town on the weekends but are always happy to answer any questions about the place!

The overall neighborhood is walkable with many fun coffee shops, restaurants, and bars that are walking distance. Some of my favorites within a block of the place are the Delta (cocktails, modern Southern food), Gallery Cafe (independent cafe), and Louie's (neighborhood bar with karaoke). For those who want to walk a little further (5-15 min), Violet Hour is one of the best cocktail bars in the city, Dove's Luncheonette is a modern Mexican diner, Publican Anker is a gastropub, and there are a million more options all walking distance! 

The blue line L station (i.e., subway) is about a 5-7 min walk and goes directly to O'Hare airport or downtown into the city.

Public transportation is very convenient in this neighborhood. The blue line L (i.e., subway) goes directly to O'Hare airport as well as downtown Chicago. 

There is also several buses within a few blocks (including the North Ave bus, which is <100 feet from the condo). 

Ubers are also very easy to call and a short ride to downtown, River North, etc.

description:
Three Level Rooftop Party Room available for events hosting up to 50 people. Includes kitchenette as well as skyline view of downtown Chicago. Great for baby showers, engagement parties, private dinners, etc.

This reservation does not include overnight stay. Event must be completed by midnight.

Myself or my host will be there to make assist with the event as needed.

The UIC neighborhood is safe and exciting neighborhood with many restaurants and bars within 2 minute walking distance. Downtown is within a 10-15 minute walk but a 5 minute Uber/taxi ride. There are plenty of exciting things to experience.

Public transportation to our location via the CTA (Chicago Transit Authority. It is also at a very unique location where all of the highways meet (I-290, I 90/94, I-55, Lake Shore Drive).

additional_house_rules:
REQUESTS:
1) Please treat the home with respect.
2) Please be courteous of others in building and neighbors. All socializing must be kept indoors after 9pm, and we request quiet time from 10pm-8am. 
3) The only guests allowed in the unit are those on the reservation. Special events will be considered on a case-by-case basis. 
4) We welcome children, but we are not child-proof. If you have specific questions/concerns, please ask before booking.

CHECK IN/OUT: 
Standard check-in time is 4pm (or later). Standard check-out time and is by 10am. If scheduling permits, we will work with you on alternate arrangements, so please inquire.  If unit is not vacated by check-out time or notes are not followed, additional cleaning charges may apply.

For check out, I ask that you:
- turn off lights/TV/AC
- place used kitchen items in dishwasher and begun cycle
- bag any trash and dispose in bins behind building
- gather all towels in bathtub; linens may be left as is 
- keys can be left inside the unit. lock front door from inside; exit via building door, which will lock automatically

access:
You will have the full unit to yourself.

KEYS

CENTRAL HEAT/AC

description:
Welcome to Chicago! Enjoy a wonderful stay in this 2-BR/1 bath unit located on a serene, residential side street. The unit has everything you need to make your visit seamless and comfortable. Plus, it's in a prime location with easy access to Wrigley, Southport, parks/beaches, theaters, restaurants/bars, as well as multiple public transportation options.

** TO READ MORE, please expand the section below.**

UNIT
Enjoy a wonderful stay in this charming 2-BR/1-BA located on this serene, residential side street. It is on the 1st story of a 3-story building. 

This unit has everything you need to make your visit seamless and comfortable. Unit features great natural lighting, granite counters, hardwood floors, and various appliances (including dishwasher, microwave, and coffee pot). Plus, it's in a prime location with easy access to Wrigley, Southport, parks/beaches, theaters, restaurants/bars, as well as multiple public transportation options.

LIVING
17.5' x 11' Features pull-out couch and Roku TV (guests log into own accounts) plus 250MB wifi. Linens for pull-out couch will be left stacked on ottoman, so that you may use couch until bedtime.

DINING
14' x 13.5' Features beautiful built-ins and glass-top dining table for 6. 

KITCHEN
12' x 11.25' Features dishwasher, microwave, stove, coffee pot, cook ware, dining ware

BEDROOM 1
12' x 7.75' Features queen-sized bed, standing wardrobe and dresser. Linens and towels included. 

BEDROOM 2 
7.75' x 7.5' Features twin-over-full bunk bed. Linens and towels included. 

BATHROOM
Located off the kitchen, the bathroom features a claw foot bathtub and vanity.

You will have the full unit to yourself.

KEYS
We provide 3 sets of keys for you.  If keys are lost, there is a $15 replacement fee.

CENTRAL HEAT/AC
The unit has central heat/AC for your convenience with a thermostat within the unit.

My goal is to ensure you have the most enjoyable and comfortable stay in Chicago. I have a detailed guest guidebook (emailed in advance and printed in unit) that includes info about the apt, neighborhood, and city to help maximize your time in the city. If you'd like additional assistance with anything, I'm more than happy to help!

Depending on my work travel schedule, I may or may not be in town; however, I'm always accessible via phone or email for any questions that arise.

The Southport Corridor of Lakeview‚Äôs neighborhood has so much within walking distance, you won't want to leave! There are numerous bakeries, boutique stores, theaters, and lively bars and restaurants.

If you do feel like venturing out of the neighborhood, Lakeview is very centrally located. Head south to visit Lincoln Park, River North, and the Loop, or west to visit Buck Town or Logan square. Within minutes in a cab, you can be in any of these places.

PARKING
Free, public street parking is available in the area with no permit required. Please note that this means you may have to circle the block a few times to find a spot. There is also metered parking on a nearby street, and that becomes free from 6pm-9am daily. If you prefer paid parking for your additional vehicles, I recommend using Spot-Hero to find nearby options that work for you.

Once you're here, public transportation and/or Uber are the easiest ways to get around the city. 

CLOSEST STOPS
o Southport brown train stop: .4 mi, trains go uptown/downtown
o Belmont red/purple/brown trains: .7 mi, trains go uptown/downtown
o 77 bus: goes east/west 

Train stations all have machines that sell Ventra passes (name of provider). You can also purchase Ventra cards at Walgreens. You can either purchase a single ride ticket or a re-loadable Ventra card (one-time $5 fee). Multiple people may share a Ventra card and fares will be deducted for each person; however, the 1, 3, and 7 day passes can not be shared.

COURTESY
Please note this unit is on a quiet residential street. We respect our neighbors and keep quiet hours from 9pm-8am. Similarly, the building's outdoor space is not for socializing, and instead we request guests socialize indoors only. Therefore, if your group is looking for more of a party environment, please allow us to recommend another unit that would be better suited for that noise level.

ENTRY
Check-in is at 4pm or later and check-out is by 10am. We provide detailed entry notes and photos to help this process go smoothly. If needed, we can provide bag storage before check-in or after check-out.

PACK N PLAY
Pack N Play may be rented for $5/night. It will be inside the unit waiting for you in its carrying case, and we request you fold it up back into its carrying case prior to departure. Note that linens are not included for the crib.
house_rules:
REQUESTS:
1) Please treat the home with respect.
2) Please be courteous of others in building and neighbors. All socializing must be kept indoors after 9pm, and we request quiet time from 10pm-8am. 
3) The only guests allowed in the unit are those on the reservation. Special events will be considered on a case-by-case basis. 
4) We welcome children, but we are not child-proof. If you have specific questions/concerns, please ask before booking.

CHECK IN/OUT: 
Standard check-in time is 4pm (or later). Standard check-out time and is by 10am. If scheduling permits, we will work with you on alternate arrangements, so please inquire.  If unit is not vacated by check-out time or notes are not followed, additional cleaning charges may apply.

For check out, I ask that you:
- turn off lights/TV/AC
- place used kitchen items in dishwasher and begun cycle
- bag any trash and dispose in bins behind building
- gather all towels in bathtub; linens may be left as is 
- keys can be left inside the unit. lock front door from inside; exit via building door, which will lock automatically

additional_house_rules:
When you make a booking you acknowledge that you have read ALL the details of this listing.  We additionally require you to read the following and write back to us in Airbnb messages, "I have read and will follow the House Rules":

HOUSE RULES:

We do not rent to locals without prior approval. If you instant book and are local your reservation will be canceled. All local inquires must get approval first before booking. Minimum age to book this unit is 25 years old. You must provide a copy of a Government-Issued Photo ID with address of the Primary Guest to us (the Host) before you will be allowed access. Hotels require this. So do we. 

Download the August Home app on your mobile device. August Home is a Smartlock that uses Bluetooth through your phone to unlock the unit.

Provide US with First/Last names AND phone numbers of those staying in the unit.

You will be granted access to the unit once you complete #1 to #6 listed above.

Please clean your dishes and put them away. Please do not rinse food down the drain. There is no garbage disposal so please put food in the garbage and then clean the dishes.

Please remove all garbage from the unit.

NO DYING HAIR IN UNIT. 

NO EXTRA GUESTS. 

NO SPECIAL EVENTS.

NO GLITTER.

Back door and laundry key are on the key hook on wall when you first walk in on your right. Take it to remove garbage so you can get back in. If you don't, you'll be locked out and have to walk around again.

Please place all towels and linens in the laundry basket in closet.

Also please remove all food and drinks you bring into the unit. 

Parking. Our block of Kenmore from Montrose to Buena is permit free with 2 exceptions:
1. St. Mary's school at Buena and Kenmore have CLEARLY displayed signs from Buena to the alley north of the school on Kenmore no parking. Obviously don't park there.
2. Pay attention to street cleaning signs or possible construction signs that may be posted on tree trunks or street poles. It is upon you to make sure these types of signs are not going to warrant you getting ticket.

Dial 911 for Emergencies
Fire Department (312) 745-3705  
Fire Extinguisher is located under the kitchen sink.

access:
You can walk to Wrigley. 5 blocks away. There are lots to do in Wrigley. Boystown is just east of Wrigley. North of us, is Uptown with music venues, restaurants and bars- The Green Mill is a famous spot.   http://greenmilljazz.com/ Ravenswood and Lincoln Square are not far.  I recommend Ubering or taking a cab home from here at night. 
Chicago has great museums, theaters, food, and nightlife.  Shedd Aquarium is awesome.  Be sure to check out the park alongside the lake. It has a bike path, running path, a skate board park is very close to this location, and beaches at Montrose and Foster. Lake Michigan never gets very warm so prepare before you jump in.
Please sign our guest book with notes about where you are from, why you are here and what you would recommend to other guests. 
Chicago can be expensive but there are a lot of things you can do for free. Here are some. Lincoln Park Zoo is worth seeing.  https://www.choosechicago.com/things-to-do/free-and-cheap-things-to-do/

Shopping		
There is a Jewel Osco (grocery) just 2 blocks from this location. Walk out door and turn left. At Montrose go right toward lake and you will walk to Jewel.					

Target is at Broadway and Sunnyside.

TIPS from a mom- 
1.	 Layer up because you can never predict what weather will do in Chicago. 
2.	Check on line before you come for schedule of events or tickets.
description:
Brand new updated and refurbished 1 bedrooom unit is located 5 blocks from Wrigley Field.  Comfortably sleeps up to 4.  Hop, skip, and jump to vibrant night life in Wrigleyville, Lakeview, Uptown, Ravenswood, and Lincoln Square.

New updated 1 bedroom with all new furniture, appliances, and amenities you'd expect and more.  Ultra clean and comfortably sleeps 2 in bedroom queen bed and 2 on twin futon and twin air mattress in living room.

5 blocks north of Wrigley Field, close to Lake Michigan, steps from public transportation, hopping nightlife, restaurants, etc.

Perfect for couples, groups up to 4, solo adventurers, and business travellers.  On a quiet tree lined street, escape into The Wrigley Retreat.

You can walk to Wrigley. 5 blocks away. There are lots to do in Wrigley. Boystown is just east of Wrigley. Parking
There is no parking permit required on our block- 4200 N Kenmore. Parking on Sheridan does not require a permit. Buena is problematic as you cannot park there when school is in session. If you park south of Buena, you will need a daily parking permit. Please notify us in advance if you require parking passes. ¬†Do not park behind the building; you will be towed and possibly get car covered in grease from track.

Transportation

We are on the RED line. Walk straight up under the tracks next to Target to the brand new Wilson stop. ¬†Or go right to Buena and go left to Sheridan and then right (south) to Irving Park stop. The RED line runs North/South pretty much in a straight line; to the north you can get to Evanston from Red to Purple line. Or transfer to Brown line by heading south and Brown line takes you in a loop of Chicago.


https://www.divvybikes.com/ ¬†¬†¬†¬†

Please notify us in advance if you require parking passes. ¬†Do not park behind the building; you will be towed and possibly get car covered in grease from track.
